[Rowland]281-rowland left [them]1067-the two sculptors to have it out in a corner , where [[Roderick]186-roderick 's Eve]1069-roderick 's eve stood over [them]1067-the two sculptors in the shaded lamplight , in vague white beauty , like the guardian angel of [the young idealist]1070-the young idealist . [Singleton]214-singleton was listening to [Madame Grandoni]217-madame grandoni , and [Rowland]281-rowland took [his]1071-he place on the sofa , near [Miss Blanchard]216-miss blanchard . [They]1067-the two sculptors had a good deal of familiar , desultory talk . Every now and then [Madame Grandoni]217-madame grandoni looked round at [them]1067-the two sculptors . [Miss Blanchard]216-miss blanchard at last asked [Rowland]281-rowland certain questions about [Roderick]186-roderick : who [he]186-roderick was , where [he]186-roderick came from , whether it was true , as [she]216-miss blanchard had heard , that [Rowland]281-rowland had discovered [him]186-roderick and brought [him]186-roderick out at [his]1071-he own expense . [Rowland]281-rowland answered [her]216-miss blanchard questions ; to the last [he]1071-he gave a vague affirmative . Finally , after a pause , looking at [him]1071-he , " [You]281-rowland 're very generous , "[216-miss blanchard] [Miss Blanchard]216-miss blanchard said . The declaration was made with a certain richness of tone , but it brought to [Rowland]281-rowland 's sense neither delight nor confusion . [He]1071-he had heard the words before ; [he]1071-he suddenly remembered the grave sincerity with which [Miss Garland]182-miss garland had uttered them as [he]1071-he strolled with [her]182-miss garland in [the woods]742-the woods the day of [Roderick]186-roderick 's picnic . [They]1073-they had pleased [him]1071-he then ; now [he]1071-he asked [Miss Blanchard]216-miss blanchard whether [she]216-miss blanchard would have some tea .

When [the two ladies]656-the two ladies withdrew , [he]1071-he attended [them]656-the two ladies to [[their]656-the two ladies carriage]1075-their carriage . Coming back to [the drawing - room]1068-the drawing - room , [he]1071-he paused outside the open door ; [he]1071-he was struck by the group formed by [the three men]1077-the three men . [They]1077-the three men were standing before [Roderick]186-roderick 's statue of [Eve]226-eve , and [the young sculptor]492-the young sculptor had lifted up the lamp and was showing different parts of it to [[his]492-the young sculptor companions]654-his companions . [He]492-the young sculptor was talking ardently , and the lamplight covered [his]492-the young sculptor head and face . [Rowland]281-rowland stood looking on , for [the group]1080-the group struck [him]1071-he with its picturesque symbolism . [Roderick]186-roderick , bearing the lamp and glowing in its radiant circle , seemed the beautiful image of [a genius which combined sincerity with power]1081-a genius which combined sincerity with power . [Gloriani]213-gloriani , with [his]1071-he head on one side , pulling [his]1071-he long moustache and looking keenly from half - closed eyes at the lighted marble , represented art with a worldly motive , skill unleavened by faith , the mere base maximum of cleverness . [Poor little Singleton]214-singleton , on the other side , with [his]214-singleton hands behind [him]214-singleton , [his]214-singleton head thrown back , and [his]214-singleton eyes following devoutly the course of [Roderick]186-roderick 's elucidation , might pass for [an embodiment of aspiring candor , with feeble wings to rise on]1082-an embodiment of aspiring candor , with feeble wings to rise on . In all this , [Roderick]186-roderick 's was certainly the beau role .

[Gloriani]213-gloriani turned to [Rowland]281-rowland as [he]1071-he came up , and pointed back with [his]1071-he thumb to the statue , with a smile half sardonic , half good - natured . " A pretty thing - a devilish pretty thing , "[1071-he] [he]1071-he said . " It 's as fresh as the foam in the milk - pail . [He]186-roderick can do it once , [he]186-roderick can do it twice , [he]186-roderick can do it at a stretch half a dozen times . But - but - "[1071-he]

[He]1071-he was returning to [his]1071-he former refrain , but [Rowland]281-rowland intercepted [him]1071-he . " Oh , [he]186-roderick will keep it up , "[1071-he] [he]1071-he said , smiling , " [I]1071-he will answer for [him]186-roderick . "[1071-he]

[Gloriani]213-gloriani was not encouraging , but [Roderick]186-roderick had listened smiling . [He]186-roderick was floating unperturbed on the tide of [his]186-roderick deep self - confidence . Now , suddenly , however , [he]186-roderick turned with a flash of irritation in [his]186-roderick eye , and demanded in a ringing voice , " In a word , then , [you]213-gloriani prophesy that [I]186-roderick am to fail ? "[186-roderick]

[Gloriani]213-gloriani answered imperturbably , patting [him]186-roderick kindly on the shoulder . " [[My]213-gloriani dear fellow]3540-my dear fellow , passion burns out , inspiration runs to seed . Some fine day [every artist]3571-every artist finds [himself]3571-every artist sitting face to face with [his]3571-every artist lump of clay , with [his]3571-every artist empty canvas , with [his]3571-every artist sheet of blank paper , waiting in vain for the revelation to be made , for [the Muse]3572-the muse to descend . [He]3571-every artist must learn to do without [the Muse]3572-the muse ! When [the fickle jade]3574-the fickle jade forgets the way to [[your]3575-your studio]3576-your studio , do n't waste any time in tearing [your]3575-your hair and meditating on suicide . Come round and see [me]213-gloriani , and [I]213-gloriani will show [you]3575-your how to console [yourself]3575-your . "[213-gloriani]

" If [I]186-roderick break down , "[186-roderick] said [Roderick]186-roderick , passionately , " [I]186-roderick shall stay down . If [the Muse]241-the muse deserts [me]186-roderick , [she]241-the muse shall at least have [her]241-the muse infidelity on [her]241-the muse conscience . "[186-roderick]

" [You]213-gloriani have no business , "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland said to [Gloriani]213-gloriani , " to talk lightly of [the Muse]3572-the muse in [this company]3578-this company . [Mr. Singleton]214-singleton , too , has received pledges from [her]3572-the muse which place [her]3572-the muse constancy beyond suspicion . "[186-roderick] And [he]186-roderick pointed out on the wall , near by , two small landscapes by [the modest water - colorist]1083-the modest water - colorist .

[The sculptor]524-the sculptor examined them with deference , and [Singleton]214-singleton [himself]214-singleton began to laugh nervously ; [he]214-singleton was trembling with hope that [the great Gloriani]213-gloriani would be pleased . " Yes , these are fresh too , "[213-gloriani] [Gloriani]213-gloriani said ; " extraordinarily fresh ! How old are [you]214-singleton ? "[213-gloriani]

" Twenty - six , [sir]3318-sir , "[214-singleton] said [Singleton]214-singleton .

" For twenty - six they are famously fresh . [They]3580-they must have taken [you]214-singleton a long time ; [you]214-singleton work slowly . "[213-gloriani]

" Yes , unfortunately , [I]213-gloriani work very slowly . One of [them]3580-they took [me]213-gloriani six weeks , the other two months . "[213-gloriani]

" Upon [my]213-gloriani word ! [The Muse]241-the muse pays [you]214-singleton long visits . "[213-gloriani] And [Gloriani]213-gloriani turned and looked , from head to foot , at so unlikely an object of [her]213-gloriani favors . [Singleton]214-singleton smiled and began to wipe [his]214-singleton forehead very hard . " Oh , [you]214-singleton ! "[524-the sculptor] said [the sculptor]524-the sculptor ; " [you]214-singleton 'll keep it up ! "[524-the sculptor]

A week after [his]214-singleton dinner - party , [Rowland]281-rowland went into [[Roderick]186-roderick 's studio]574-roderick 's studio and found [him]186-roderick sitting before an unfinished piece of work , with a hanging head and a heavy eye . [He]214-singleton could have fancied that the fatal hour foretold by [Gloriani]213-gloriani had struck . [Roderick]186-roderick rose with a sombre yawn and flung down [his]186-roderick tools . " It 's no use , "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick said , " [I]186-roderick give it up ! "[186-roderick]

" What is it ? "[281-rowland]

" [I]186-roderick have struck a shallow ! [I]186-roderick have been sailing bravely , but for the last day or two [my]186-roderick keel has been crunching the bottom . "[186-roderick]

" A difficult place ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland asked , with a sympathetic inflection , looking vaguely at [the roughly modeled figure]1087-the roughly modeled figure .

" Oh , it 's not the poor clay ! "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick answered . " [The difficult place]3581-the difficult place is here ! "[186-roderick] And [he]186-roderick struck a blow on [his]186-roderick heart . " [I]186-roderick do n't know what 's the matter with [me]186-roderick . Nothing comes ; all of a sudden [I]186-roderick hate things . [My]186-roderick old things look ugly ; everything looks stupid . "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland was perplexed . [He]214-singleton was in the situation of [a man who has been riding a blood horse at an even , elastic gallop]1088-a man who has been riding a blood horse at an even , elastic gallop , and of a sudden feels [him]214-singleton stumble and balk . As yet , [he]214-singleton reflected , [he]214-singleton had seen nothing but the sunshine of genius ; [he]214-singleton had forgotten that it has its storms . Of course it had ! And [he]214-singleton felt a flood of comradeship rise in [his]214-singleton heart which would float [them]1089-they both safely through the worst weather . " Why , [you]281-rowland 're tired ! "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton said . " Of course [you]281-rowland 're tired . [You]281-rowland have a right to be ! "[214-singleton]

" Do [you]214-singleton think [I]186-roderick have a right to be ? "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick asked , looking at [him]214-singleton .

" Unquestionably , after all [you]214-singleton have done . "[186-roderick]

" Well , then , right or wrong , [I]214-singleton am tired . [I]214-singleton certainly have done a fair winter 's work . [I]214-singleton want a change . "[214-singleton]

[Rowland]281-rowland declared that it was certainly high time [they]1089-they should be leaving [Rome]4-rome . [They]1089-they would go north and travel . [They]1089-they would go to [Switzerland]74-switzerland , to [Germany]75-germany , to [Holland]76-holland , to [England]77-england . [Roderick]186-roderick assented , [his]186-roderick eye brightened , and [Rowland]281-rowland talked of a dozen things [they]1089-they might do . [Roderick]186-roderick walked up and down ; [he]186-roderick seemed to have something to say which [he]186-roderick hesitated to bring out . [He]186-roderick hesitated so rarely that [Rowland]281-rowland wondered , and at last asked [him]186-roderick what was on [his]186-roderick mind . [Roderick]186-roderick stopped before [him]186-roderick , frowning a little .

" [I]186-roderick have such unbounded faith in [your]281-rowland good - will , "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick said , " that [I]186-roderick believe nothing [I]186-roderick can say would offend [you]281-rowland . "[186-roderick]

" Try it , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" Well , then , [I]186-roderick think [my]186-roderick journey will do [me]186-roderick more good if [I]186-roderick take it alone . [I]186-roderick need n't say [I]186-roderick prefer [[your]281-rowland society]3582-your society to that of [any man living]3583-any man living . For the last six months it has been everything to [me]186-roderick . But [I]186-roderick have a perpetual feeling that [you]281-rowland are expecting something of [me]186-roderick , that [you]281-rowland are measuring [my]186-roderick doings by a terrifically high standard . [You]281-rowland are watching [me]186-roderick ; [I]186-roderick do n't want to be watched . [I]186-roderick want to go [my]186-roderick own way ; to work when [I]186-roderick choose and to loaf when [I]186-roderick choose . It is not that [I]186-roderick do n't know what [I]186-roderick owe [you]281-rowland ; it is not that [we]3584-we are not [friends]3405-friends . It is simply that [I]186-roderick want a taste of absolutely unrestricted freedom . Therefore , [I]186-roderick say , let [us]3584-we separate . "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland shook [him]1090-he by the hand . " Willingly . Do as [you]1090-he desire , [I]281-rowland shall miss [you]1090-he , and [I]281-rowland venture to believe [you]1090-he 'll pass some lonely hours . But [I]281-rowland have only one request to make : that if [you]1090-he get into trouble of any kind whatever , [you]1090-he will immediately let [me]281-rowland know . "[281-rowland]

[They]1091-they began [their]1091-they journey , however , together , and crossed [the Alps]78-the alps side by side , muffled in one rug , on the top of [the St. Gothard coach]1092-the st. gothard coach . [Rowland]281-rowland was going to [England]77-england to pay some promised visits ; [[his]1090-he companion]555-his companion had no plan save to ramble through [Switzerland]74-switzerland and [Germany]75-germany as fancy guided [him]1090-he . [He]1090-he had money , now , that would outlast the summer ; when it was spent [he]1090-he would come back to [Rome]4-rome and make another statue . At [a little mountain village]1094-a little mountain village by the way , [Roderick]186-roderick declared that [he]186-roderick would stop ; [he]186-roderick would scramble about a little in the high places and doze in the shade of [the pine forests]1095-the pine forests . [The coach]1096-the coach was changing horses ; [the two young men]608-the two young men walked along [the village street]1098-the village street , picking [their]608-the two young men way between dunghills , breathing the light , cool air , and listening to the plash of the fountain and the tinkle of cattle - bells . [The coach]1096-the coach overtook [them]608-the two young men , and then [Rowland]281-rowland , as [he]1090-he prepared to mount , felt an almost overmastering reluctance .

" Say the word , "[1090-he] [he]1090-he exclaimed , " and [I]1090-he will stop too . "[1090-he]

[Roderick]186-roderick frowned . " Ah , [you]186-roderick do n't trust [me]186-roderick ; [you]186-roderick do n't think [I]186-roderick ' m able to take care of [myself]186-roderick . That proves that [I]186-roderick was right in feeling as if [I]186-roderick were watched ! "[186-roderick]

" Watched , [[my]281-rowland dear fellow]3540-my dear fellow ! "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland . " [I]281-rowland hope [you]186-roderick may never have anything worse to complain of than being watched in the spirit in which [I]281-rowland watch [you]186-roderick . But [I]281-rowland will spare [you]186-roderick even that . Good - by ! "[281-rowland] Standing in [his]1090-he place , as [the coach]1096-the coach rolled away , [he]1090-he looked back at [[his]1090-he friend]606-his friend lingering by [the roadside]1102-the roadside . [A great snow - mountain , behind [Roderick]186-roderick]1103-a great snow - mountain , behind roderick , was beginning to turn pink in the sunset . [The young man]347-the young man waved [his]347-the young man hat , still looking grave . [Rowland]281-rowland settled [himself]281-rowland in [his]1090-he place , reflecting after all that this was a salubrious beginning of independence . [He]1090-he was among [forests and glaciers]1105-forests and glaciers , leaning on the pure bosom of nature . And then - and then - was it not in itself a guarantee against folly to be engaged to [Mary Garland]193-mary garland ?

CHAPTER IV . [Experience

Rowland]243-rowland passed the summer in [England]77-england , staying with [several old friends]1106-several old friends and [two or three new ones]1107-two or three new ones . On [his]1090-he arrival , [he]1090-he felt it on [his]1090-he conscience to write to [Mrs. Hudson]191-mrs. hudson and inform [her]191-mrs. hudson that [[her]191-mrs. hudson son]459-her son had relieved [him]1090-he of [his]1090-he tutelage . [He]1090-he felt that [she]191-mrs. hudson considered [him]1090-he an incorruptible Mentor , following [Roderick]186-roderick like a shadow , and [he]1090-he wished to let [her]191-mrs. hudson know the truth . But [he]1090-he made the truth very comfortable , and gave a succinct statement of [the young man]347-the young man 's brilliant beginnings . [He]1090-he owed it to [himself]1090-he , [he]1090-he said , to remind [her]191-mrs. hudson that [he]1090-he had not judged lightly , and that [Roderick]186-roderick 's present achievements were more profitable than [his]1090-he inglorious drudgery at [Messrs. Striker Spooner 's]79-messrs. striker spooner 's . [He]1090-he was now taking a well - earned holiday and proposing to see a little of [the world]483-the world . [He]1090-he would work none the worse for this ; [every artist]3571-every artist needed to knock about and look at things for [himself]3571-every artist . [They]1112-they had parted company for a couple of months , for [Roderick]186-roderick was now [a great man]3322-a great man and beyond the need of going about with [a keeper]1114-a keeper . But [they]1112-they were to meet again in [Rome]4-rome in the autumn , and then [he]1090-he should be able to send [her]191-mrs. hudson more good news . Meanwhile , [he]1090-he was very happy in what [Roderick]186-roderick had already done - especially happy in the happiness it must have brought to [her]191-mrs. hudson . [He]1090-he ventured to ask to be kindly commended to [Miss Garland]182-miss garland .

[His]1090-he letter was promptly answered - to [his]1090-he surprise in [Miss Garland]182-miss garland 's own hand . The same mail brought also an epistle from [Cecilia]169-cecilia . The latter was voluminous , and [we]1112-they must content [ourselves]1112-they with giving an extract .

" [Your]169-cecilia letter was filled with an echo of that brilliant Roman world , which made [me]182-miss garland almost ill with envy . For a week after [I]182-miss garland got it [I]182-miss garland thought Northampton really unpardonably tame . But [I]182-miss garland am drifting back again to [my]182-miss garland old deeps of resignation , and [I]182-miss garland rush to the window , when [any one]3119-any one passes , with all [my]182-miss garland old gratitude for small favors . So [Roderick Hudson]3588-roderick hudson is already [a great man]3322-a great man , and [you]169-cecilia turn out to be [a great prophet]3590-a great prophet ? [My]182-miss garland compliments to both of [you]169-cecilia ; [I]182-miss garland never heard of anything working so smoothly . And [he]3588-roderick hudson takes it all very quietly , and does n't lose [his]3588-roderick hudson balance nor let it turn [his]3588-roderick hudson head ? [You]169-cecilia judged [him]3588-roderick hudson , then , in a day better than [I]182-miss garland had done in six months , for [I]182-miss garland really did not expect that [he]3588-roderick hudson would settle down into such a jog - trot of prosperity . [I]182-miss garland believed [he]3588-roderick hudson would do fine things , but [I]182-miss garland was sure [he]3588-roderick hudson would intersperse them with a good many follies , and that [his]3588-roderick hudson beautiful statues would spring up out of the midst of a straggling plantation of wild oats . But from what [you]169-cecilia tell [me]182-miss garland , [Mr. Striker]185-mr. striker may now go hang [himself]185-mr. striker ..... There is one thing , however , to say as [a friend]3219-a friend , in the way of warning . [That candid soul]3592-that candid soul can keep a secret , and [he]3588-roderick hudson may have private designs on [your]169-cecilia equanimity which [you]169-cecilia do n't begin to suspect . What do [you]169-cecilia think of [his]3588-roderick hudson being engaged to [Miss Garland]182-miss garland ? [The two ladies]656-the two ladies had given no hint of it all winter , but a fortnight ago , when those big photographs of [his]3588-roderick hudson statues arrived , [they]656-the two ladies first pinned them up on the wall , and then trotted out into [the town]507-the town , made a dozen calls , and announced the news . [Mrs. Hudson]191-mrs. hudson did , at least ; [Miss Garland]182-miss garland , [I]182-miss garland suppose , sat at [home]349-home writing letters . To [me]182-miss garland , [I]182-miss garland confess , the thing was a perfect surprise . [I]182-miss garland had not a suspicion that all the while [he]3588-roderick hudson was coming so regularly to make [himself]3588-roderick hudson agreeable on [[my]182-miss garland veranda]3596-my veranda , [he]3588-roderick hudson was quietly preferring [[his]3588-roderick hudson cousin]343-his cousin to [any one else]3598-any one else . Not , indeed , that [he]3588-roderick hudson was ever at particular pains to make [himself]3588-roderick hudson agreeable ! [I]182-miss garland suppose [he]3588-roderick hudson has picked up a few graces in [Rome]4-rome . But [he]3588-roderick hudson must not acquire too many : if [he]3588-roderick hudson is too polite when [he]3588-roderick hudson comes back , [Miss Garland]182-miss garland will count [him]3588-roderick hudson as [one of the lost]3599-one of the lost . [She]182-miss garland will be a very good wife for [a man of genius]3300-a man of genius , and such a one as [they]3601-they are often shrewd enough to take . [She]182-miss garland 'll darn [his]3588-roderick hudson stockings and keep [his]3588-roderick hudson accounts , and sit at [home]349-home and trim the lamp and keep up the fire while [he]3588-roderick hudson studies the Beautiful in [pretty neighbors]3603-pretty neighbors at dinner - parties . [The two ladies]656-the two ladies are evidently very happy , and , to do [them]656-the two ladies justice , very humbly grateful to [you]3605-you . [Mrs. Hudson]191-mrs. hudson never speaks of [you]3605-you without tears in [her]191-mrs. hudson eyes , and [I]182-miss garland am sure [she]191-mrs. hudson considers [you]3605-you [a specially patented agent of [Providence]222-providence]3606-a specially patented agent of providence . Verily , it 's a good thing for [a woman]3607-a woman to be in love : [Miss Garland]182-miss garland has grown almost pretty . [I]182-miss garland met [her]182-miss garland the other night at a tea - party ; [she]182-miss garland had a white rose in [her]182-miss garland hair , and sang a sentimental ballad in a fine contralto voice . "[182-miss garland]

[Miss Garland]182-miss garland 's letter was so much shorter that [we]1115-we may give it entire : -

[[My]0-i dear [Sir]3318-sir]3524-my dear sir , - [Mrs. Hudson]191-mrs. hudson , as [I]0-i suppose [you]3318-sir know , has been for some time unable to use [her]182-miss garland eyes . [She]182-miss garland requests [me]0-i , therefore , to answer [your]3318-sir favor of the 22d of June . [She]182-miss garland thanks [you]3318-sir extremely for writing , and wishes [me]0-i to say that [she]182-miss garland considers [herself]182-miss garland in every way under great obligations to [you]3318-sir . [Your]3318-sir account of [[her]182-miss garland son]459-her son 's progress and the high estimation in which [he]459-her son is held has made [her]182-miss garland very happy , and [she]182-miss garland earnestly prays that all may continue well with [him]459-her son . [He]459-her son sent [us]1119-us , a short time ago , several large photographs of [his]459-her son two statues , taken from different points of view . [We]1119-us know little about such things , but they seem to [us]1119-us wonderfully beautiful . [We]1119-us sent them to [Boston]22-boston to be handsomely framed , and [the man]3289-the man , on returning them , wrote [us]1119-us that [he]3289-the man had exhibited them for a week in [[his]3289-the man store]1121-his store , and that they had attracted great attention . The frames are magnificent , and the pictures now hang in a row on the parlor wall . [Our]1119-us only quarrel with [them]1122-them is that [they]1122-them make the old papering and the engravings look dreadfully shabby . [Mr. Striker]185-mr. striker stood and looked at [them]1122-them the other day full five minutes , and said , at last , that if [Roderick]186-roderick 's head was running on such things it was no wonder [he]186-roderick could not learn to draw up a deed . [We]1119-us lead here so quiet and monotonous a life that [I]0-i am afraid [I]0-i can tell [you]1123-you nothing that will interest [you]1123-you . [Mrs. Hudson]191-mrs. hudson requests [me]0-i to say that the little more or less that may happen to [us]1119-us is of small account , as [we]1119-us live in [our]1119-us thoughts and [our]1119-us thoughts are fixed on [[her]191-mrs. hudson dear son]1124-her dear son . [She]191-mrs. hudson thanks [Heaven]244-heaven [he]1124-her dear son has so good [a friend]3219-a friend . [Mrs. Hudson]191-mrs. hudson says that this is too short a letter , but [I]0-i can say nothing more .

[Yours]1123-you most respectfully ,

[Mary Garland]193-mary garland .

It is a question whether [the reader]388-the reader will know why , but this letter gave [Rowland]243-rowland extraordinary pleasure . [He]243-rowland liked its very brevity and meagreness , and there seemed to [him]243-rowland an exquisite modesty in its saying nothing from [the young girl]659-the young girl [herself]659-the young girl . [He]243-rowland delighted in the formal address and conclusion ; [they]1128-they pleased [him]243-rowland as [he]243-rowland had been pleased by an angular gesture in some expressive girlish figure in an early painting . The letter renewed that impression of strong feeling combined with an almost rigid simplicity , which [[Roderick]186-roderick 's betrothed]1129-roderick 's betrothed had personally given [him]186-roderick . And its homely stiffness seemed a vivid reflection of a life concentrated , as [the young girl]659-the young girl had borrowed warrant from [[her]659-the young girl companion]1131-her companion to say , in a single devoted idea . The monotonous days of [the two women]675-the two women seemed to [Rowland]243-rowland 's fancy to follow each other like the tick - tick of a great time - piece , marking off the hours which separated [them]675-the two women from the supreme felicity of clasping [the far - away son]1133-the far - away son and [lover]1134-lover to lips sealed with the excess of joy . [He]243-rowland hoped that [Roderick]186-roderick , now that [he]186-roderick had shaken off the oppression of [his]186-roderick own importunate faith , was not losing a tolerant temper for the silent prayers of [the two women]675-the two women at [Northampton]2-northampton .

[He]243-rowland was left to vain conjectures , however , as to [Roderick]186-roderick 's actual moods and occupations . [He]243-rowland knew [he]243-rowland was [no letter - writer]1136-no letter - writer , and that , in [the young sculptor]492-the young sculptor 's own phrase , [he]243-rowland had at any time rather build a monument than write a note . But when a month had passed without news of [him]243-rowland , [he]243-rowland began to be half anxious and half angry , and wrote [him]243-rowland three lines , in the care of [a Continental banker]1138-a continental banker , begging [him]243-rowland at least to give some sign of whether [he]243-rowland was alive or dead . A week afterwards came an answer - brief , and dated [Baden - Baden]245-baden - baden . " [I]186-roderick know [I]186-roderick have been [a great brute]3608-a great brute , "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick wrote , " not to have sent [you]3609-you a word before ; but really [I]186-roderick do n't know what has got into [me]186-roderick . [I]186-roderick have lately learned terribly well how to be idle . [I]186-roderick am afraid to think how long it is since [I]186-roderick wrote to [[my]186-roderick mother]3224-my mother or to [Mary]193-mary garland . Heaven help [them]3611-them - [poor , patient , trustful creatures]3612-poor , patient , trustful creatures ! [I]186-roderick do n't know how to tell [you]3609-you what [I]186-roderick am doing . It seems all amusing enough while [I]186-roderick do it , but it would make a poor show in a narrative intended for [your]3609-you formidable eyes . [I]186-roderick found [Baxter]246-baxter in [Switzerland]74-switzerland , or rather [he]246-baxter found [me]186-roderick , and [he]246-baxter grabbed [me]186-roderick by the arm and brought [me]186-roderick here . [I]186-roderick was walking twenty miles a day in [the Alps]78-the alps , drinking milk in [lonely chalets]3613-lonely chalets , sleeping as [you]3609-you sleep , and thinking it was all very good fun ; but [Baxter]246-baxter told [me]186-roderick it would never do , that [the Alps]3614-the alps were 'd - - d rot , ' that [Baden - Baden]245-baden - baden was [the place]3197-the place , and that if [I]186-roderick knew what was good for [me]186-roderick [I]186-roderick would come along with [him]246-baxter . It is [a wonderful place]3616-a wonderful place , certainly , though , thank [the Lord]3617-the lord , [Baxter]246-baxter departed last week , blaspheming horribly at trente et quarante . But [you]3609-you know all about it and what one does - what one is liable to do . [I]186-roderick have succumbed , in a measure , to the liabilities , and [I]186-roderick wish [I]186-roderick had [some one]3618-some one here to give [me]186-roderick a thundering good blowing up . Not [you]3609-you , [dear friend]3619-dear friend ; [you]3609-you would draw it too mild ; [you]3609-you have too much of the milk of human kindness . [I]186-roderick have fits of horrible homesickness for [[my]186-roderick studio]3620-my studio , and [I]186-roderick shall be devoutly grateful when the summer is over and [I]186-roderick can go back and swing a chisel . [I]186-roderick feel as if nothing but the chisel would satisfy [me]186-roderick ; as if [I]186-roderick could rush in a rage at a block of unshaped marble . There are a lot of [the Roman people]3621-the roman people here , [English and American]3622-english and american ; [I]186-roderick live in the midst of [them]3622-english and american and talk nonsense from morning till night . There is also [some one else]3623-some one else ; and to [her]3623-some one else [I]186-roderick do n't talk sense , nor , thank heaven , mean what [I]186-roderick say . [I]186-roderick confess , [I]186-roderick need a month 's work to recover [my]186-roderick self - respect . "[186-roderick]

These lines brought [Rowland]243-rowland no small perturbation ; the more , that what [they]1139-they seemed to point to surprised [him]243-rowland . During the nine months of [their]1140-their companionship [Roderick]186-roderick had shown so little taste for dissipation that [Rowland]243-rowland had come to think of it as a canceled danger , and it greatly perplexed [him]243-rowland to learn that [[his]243-rowland friend]606-his friend had apparently proved so pliant to opportunity . But [Roderick]186-roderick 's allusions were ambiguous , and it was possible they might simply mean that [he]186-roderick was out of patience with a frivolous way of life and fretting wholesomely over [his]186-roderick absent work . It was a very good thing , certainly , that idleness should prove , on experiment , to sit heavily on [his]186-roderick conscience . Nevertheless , the letter needed , to [Rowland]243-rowland 's mind , a key : the key arrived a week later . " In common charity , "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick wrote , " lend [me]186-roderick a hundred pounds ! [I]186-roderick have gambled away [my]186-roderick last franc - [I]186-roderick have made a mountain of debts . Send [me]186-roderick the money first ; lecture [me]186-roderick afterwards ! "[186-roderick] [Rowland]243-rowland sent the money by return of mail ; then [he]243-rowland proceeded , not to lecture , but to think . [He]243-rowland hung [his]243-rowland head ; [he]243-rowland was acutely disappointed . [He]243-rowland had no right to be , [he]243-rowland assured [himself]243-rowland ; but so it was . [Roderick]186-roderick was young , impulsive , unpracticed in stoicism ; it was a hundred to one that [he]186-roderick was to pay the usual vulgar tribute to folly . But [[his]186-roderick friend]606-his friend had regarded it as securely gained to [his]186-roderick own belief in virtue that [he]186-roderick was not as [other foolish youths]1143-other foolish youths are , and that [he]186-roderick would have been capable of looking at folly in the face and passing on [his]186-roderick way . [Rowland]243-rowland for a while felt a sore sense of wrath . What right had [a man who was engaged to [that fine girl]1145-that fine girl in [Northampton]2-northampton to behave as if [his]186-roderick consciousness were a common blank , to be overlaid with coarse sensations]1144-a man who was engaged to that fine girl in northampton to behave as if his consciousness were a common blank , to be overlaid with coarse sensations ? Yes , distinctly , [he]243-rowland was disappointed . [He]243-rowland had accompanied [his]243-rowland missive with an urgent recommendation to leave [Baden - Baden]245-baden - baden immediately , and an offer to meet [Roderick]186-roderick at any point [he]243-rowland would name . The answer came promptly ; it ran as follows : " Send [me]186-roderick another fifty pounds ! [I]186-roderick have been back to the tables . [I]186-roderick will leave as soon as the money comes , and meet [you]186-roderick at [Geneva]82-geneva . There [I]186-roderick will tell [you]186-roderick everything . "[186-roderick]

There is [an ancient terrace at [Geneva]82-geneva , planted with trees and studded with benches , overlooked by [gravely aristocratic old dwellings]1147-gravely aristocratic old dwellings and overlooking [the distant Alps]78-the alps]1146-an ancient terrace at geneva , planted with trees and studded with benches , overlooked by gravely aristocratic old dwellings and overlooking the distant alps . A great many generations have made [it]1146-an ancient terrace at geneva , planted with trees and studded with benches , overlooked by gravely aristocratic old dwellings and overlooking the distant alps [a lounging - place]1148-a lounging - place , [a great many friends]1149-a great many friends and [lovers]1150-lovers strolled [there]3420-there , a great many confidential talks and momentous interviews gone forward . Here , one morning , sitting on one of the battered green benches , [Roderick]186-roderick , as [he]186-roderick had promised , told [[his]186-roderick friend]606-his friend everything . [He]186-roderick had arrived late the night before ; [he]186-roderick looked tired , and yet flushed and excited . [He]186-roderick made no professions of penitence , but [he]186-roderick practiced an unmitigated frankness , and [his]186-roderick self - reprobation might be taken for granted . [He]186-roderick implied in every phrase that [he]186-roderick had done with it all , and that [he]186-roderick was counting the hours till [he]186-roderick could get back to work . [We]1153-we shall not rehearse [his]186-roderick confession in detail ; its main outline will be sufficient . [He]186-roderick had fallen in with [some very idle people]1154-some very idle people , and had discovered that a little example and a little practice were capable of producing on [his]186-roderick own part a considerable relish for [their]1154-some very idle people diversions . What could [he]186-roderick do ? [He]186-roderick never read , and [he]186-roderick had no studio ; in one way or another [he]186-roderick had to pass the time . [He]186-roderick passed it in dangling about [several very pretty women in [wonderful Paris toilets]1156-wonderful paris toilets]1155-several very pretty women in wonderful paris toilets , and reflected that it was always something gained for [a sculptor]3131-a sculptor to sit under a tree , looking at [his]3131-a sculptor leisure into a charming face and saying things that made it smile and play its muscles and part its lips and show its teeth . Attached to [these ladies]1158-these ladies were [certain gentlemen who walked about in clouds of perfume , rose at midday , and supped at midnight]1159-certain gentlemen who walked about in clouds of perfume , rose at midday , and supped at midnight . [Roderick]186-roderick had found [himself]186-roderick in the mood for thinking [them]1159-certain gentlemen who walked about in clouds of perfume , rose at midday , and supped at midnight very amusing fellows . [He]186-roderick was surprised at [his]186-roderick own taste , but [he]186-roderick let it take its course . It led [him]186-roderick to the discovery that to live with ladies who expect [you]1160-you to present [them]1154-some very idle people with expensive bouquets , to ride with [them]1154-some very idle people in [the Black Forest]84-the black forest on well - looking horses , to come into [their]1154-some very idle people opera - boxes on nights when [Patti]247-patti sang and prices were consequent , to propose little light suppers at [the Conversation House]1161-the conversation house after the opera or drives by moonlight to [the Castle]1162-the castle , [to be always arrayed and anointed , trinketed and gloved]1163-to be always arrayed and anointed , trinketed and gloved , - that to move in such society , [we]1164-we say , though it might be a privilege , was a privilege with a penalty attached . But the tables made such things easy ; half [the Baden world]1165-the baden world lived by the tables . [Roderick]186-roderick tried them and found that at first they smoothed [his]186-roderick path delightfully . This simplification of matters , however , was only momentary , for [he]186-roderick soon perceived that to seem to have money , and to have it in fact , exposed [a good - looking young man]1166-a good - looking young man to peculiar liabilities . At this point of [[his]186-roderick friend]606-his friend 's narrative , [Rowland]243-rowland was reminded of [Madame de Cruchecassee]248-madame de cruchecassee in The Newcomes , and though [he]186-roderick had listened in tranquil silence to the rest of it , [he]186-roderick found it hard not to say that all this had been , under the circumstances , a very bad business . [Roderick]186-roderick admitted it with bitterness , and then told how much - measured simply financially - it had cost [him]186-roderick . [His]186-roderick luck had changed ; the tables had ceased to back [him]186-roderick , and [he]186-roderick had found [himself]186-roderick up to [his]186-roderick knees in debt . Every penny had gone of the solid sum which had seemed a large equivalent of those shining statues in [Rome]4-rome . [He]186-roderick had been [an ass]1168-an ass , but it was not irreparable ; [he]186-roderick could make another statue in a couple of months .

[Rowland]243-rowland frowned . " For heaven 's sake , "[243-rowland] [he]243-rowland said , " do n't play such dangerous games with [[your]186-roderick facility]3624-your facility . If [you]186-roderick have got facility , revere it , respect it , adore it , treasure it - do n't speculate on it . "[243-rowland] And [he]186-roderick wondered what [[his]186-roderick companion]555-his companion , up to [his]186-roderick knees in debt , would have done if there had been no good - natured [Rowland Mallet]281-rowland to lend a helping hand . But [he]186-roderick did not formulate [his]186-roderick curiosity audibly , and the contingency seemed not to have presented itself to [Roderick]186-roderick 's imagination . [The young sculptor]492-the young sculptor reverted to [his]492-the young sculptor late adventures again in the evening , and this time talked of them more objectively , as the phrase is ; more as if they had been the adventures of [another person]3277-another person . [He]186-roderick related half a dozen droll things that had happened to [him]186-roderick , and , as if [his]186-roderick responsibility had been disengaged by all this free discussion , [he]186-roderick laughed extravagantly at the memory of them . [Rowland]281-rowland sat perfectly grave , on principle . Then [Roderick]186-roderick began to talk of half a dozen statues that [he]186-roderick had in [his]186-roderick head , and set forth [his]186-roderick design , with [his]186-roderick usual vividness . Suddenly , as it was relevant , [he]186-roderick declared that [his]186-roderick Baden doings had not been altogether fruitless , for that [the lady who had reminded [Rowland]281-rowland of [Madame de Cruchecassee]248-madame de cruchecassee]1172-the lady who had reminded rowland of madame de cruchecassee was tremendously statuesque . [Rowland]281-rowland at last said that it all might pass if [he]186-roderick felt that [he]186-roderick was really the wiser for it . " By the wiser , "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick added , " [I]186-roderick mean the stronger in purpose , in will . "[186-roderick]

" Oh , do n't talk about will ! "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick answered , throwing back [his]186-roderick head and looking at the stars . This conversation also took place in the open air , on [the little island in [the shooting Rhone]85-the shooting rhone where [Jean - Jacques]249-jean - jacques]1173-the little island in the shooting rhone where jean - jacques has [a monument]1174-a monument . " The will , [I]249-jean - jacques believe , is the mystery of mysteries . Who can answer for [his]186-roderick will ? who can say beforehand that it 's strong ? There are all kinds of indefinable currents moving to and fro between one 's will and [one]3107-one 's inclinations . [People]3189-people talk as if the two things were essentially distinct ; on different sides of one 's organism , like the heart and the liver . [Mine]249-jean - jacques , [I]249-jean - jacques know , are much nearer together . It all depends upon circumstances . [I]249-jean - jacques believe there is a certain group of circumstances possible for [every man]3627-every man , in which [his]3627-every man will is destined to snap like a dry twig . "[249-jean - jacques]

" [[My]281-rowland dear boy]3628-my dear boy , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , " do n't talk about the will being ' destined . ' The will is destiny itself . That 's the way to look at it . "[281-rowland]

" Look at it , [[my]186-roderick dear]3110-my dear [Rowland]281-rowland , "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick answered , " as [you]281-rowland find most comfortable . One conviction [I]186-roderick have gathered from [my]186-roderick summer 's experience , "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick went on - " it 's as well to look it frankly in the face - is that [I]186-roderick possess an almost unlimited susceptibility to the influence of [a beautiful woman]3630-a beautiful woman . "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland stared , then strolled away , softly whistling to [himself]281-rowland . [He]1175-he was unwilling to admit even to [himself]1175-he that this speech had really the sinister meaning it seemed to have . In a few days [the two young men]608-the two young men made [their]608-the two young men way back to [Italy]24-italy , and lingered a while in [Florence]46-florence before going on to [Rome]4-rome . In [Florence]46-florence [Roderick]186-roderick seemed to have won back [his]186-roderick old innocence and [his]186-roderick preference for the pleasures of study over any others . [Rowland]281-rowland began to think of the Baden episode as a bad dream , or at the worst as a mere sporadic piece of disorder , without roots in [[his]1175-he companion]555-his companion 's character . [They]608-the two young men passed a fortnight looking at pictures and exploring for out the way bits of fresco and carving , and [Roderick]186-roderick recovered all [his]186-roderick earlier fervor of appreciation and comment . In [Rome]4-rome [he]186-roderick went eagerly to work again , and finished in a month two or three small things [he]186-roderick had left standing on [his]186-roderick departure . [He]186-roderick talked the most joyous nonsense about finding [himself]186-roderick back in [[his]186-roderick old quarters]1178-his old quarters . On the first Sunday afternoon following [their]608-the two young men return , on [their]608-the two young men going together to [Saint Peter]265-saint peter 's , [he]186-roderick delivered [himself]186-roderick of a lyrical greeting to [the great church]1179-the great church and to [the city]832-the city in general , in a tone of voice so irrepressibly elevated that it rang through [the nave]1181-the nave in rather a scandalous fashion , and almost arrested [a procession of canons who were marching across to [the choir]1183-the choir]1182-a procession of canons who were marching across to the choir . [He]186-roderick began to model a new statue - a female figure , of which [he]186-roderick had said nothing to [Rowland]281-rowland . It represented [a woman]3607-a woman , leaning lazily back in [her]3607-a woman chair , with [her]3607-a woman head drooping as if [she]3607-a woman were listening , a vague smile on [her]3607-a woman lips , and a pair of remarkably beautiful arms folded in [her]3607-a woman lap . With rather less softness of contour , it would have resembled the noble statue of [Agrippina]250-agrippina in [the Capitol]942-the capitol . [Rowland]281-rowland looked at it and was not sure [he]186-roderick liked it . " Who is it ? what does it mean ? "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick asked .

" Anything [you]281-rowland please ! "[186-roderick] said [Roderick]186-roderick , with a certain petulance . " [I]186-roderick call it A Reminiscence . "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland then remembered that [one of [the Baden ladies]1187-the baden ladies]1186-one of the baden ladies had been ' statuesque , " and asked no more questions . This , after all , was a way of profiting by experience . A few days later [he]186-roderick took [his]186-roderick first ride of the season on [the Campagna]59-the campagna , and as , on [his]186-roderick homeward way , [he]186-roderick was passing across the long shadow of [a ruined tower]3631-a ruined tower , [he]186-roderick perceived [a small figure at a short distance , bent over a sketch - book]3632-a small figure at a short distance , bent over a sketch - book . As [he]186-roderick drew near , [he]186-roderick recognized [[his]186-roderick friend]606-his friend [Singleton]214-singleton . [The honest little painter]3634-the honest little painter 's face was scorched to flame - color by the light of southern suns , and borrowed an even deeper crimson from [his]3634-the honest little painter gleeful greeting of [[his]3634-the honest little painter most appreciative patron]3635-his most appreciative patron . [He]3634-the honest little painter was making a careful and charming little sketch . On [Rowland]281-rowland 's asking [him]3634-the honest little painter how [he]3634-the honest little painter had spent [his]3634-the honest little painter summer , [he]3634-the honest little painter gave an account of [his]3634-the honest little painter wanderings which made [poor Mallet]281-rowland sigh with a sense of more contrasts than one . [He]3634-the honest little painter had not been out of [Italy]24-italy , but [he]3634-the honest little painter had been delving deep into [the picturesque heart of [the lovely land]3637-the lovely land]3636-the picturesque heart of the lovely land , and gathering a wonderful store of subjects . [He]3634-the honest little painter had rambled about among [the unvisited villages of [the Apennines]87-the apennines]3638-the unvisited villages of the apennines , pencil in hand and knapsack on back , sleeping on straw and eating black bread and beans , but feasting on local color , rioting , as it were , on chiaroscuro , and laying up a treasure of pictorial observations . [He]3634-the honest little painter took a devout satisfaction in [his]3634-the honest little painter hard - earned wisdom and [his]3634-the honest little painter happy frugality . [Rowland]281-rowland went the next day , by appointment , to look at [his]3634-the honest little painter sketches , and spent a whole morning turning them over . [Singleton]214-singleton talked more than [he]214-singleton had ever done before , explained them all , and told some quaintly humorous anecdote about the production of each .[1186-one of the baden ladies]

" Dear [me]1188-i , how [I]1188-i have chattered ! "[1188-i] [he]1188-i said at last . " [I]1188-i am afraid [you]214-singleton had rather have looked at the things in peace and quiet . [I]1188-i did n't know [I]1188-i could talk so much . But somehow , [I]1188-i feel very happy ; [I]1188-i feel as if [I]1188-i had improved . "[1188-i]

" That [you]214-singleton have , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland . " [I]281-rowland doubt whether [an artist]3186-an artist ever passed a more profitable three months . [You]214-singleton must feel much more sure of [yourself]214-singleton . "[281-rowland]

[Singleton]214-singleton looked for a long time with great intentness at a knot in the floor . " Yes , "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton said at last , in a fluttered tone , " [I]214-singleton feel much more sure of [myself]214-singleton . [I]214-singleton have got more facility ! "[214-singleton] And [he]214-singleton lowered [his]214-singleton voice as if [he]214-singleton were communicating a secret which it took some courage to impart . " [I]214-singleton hardly like to say it , for fear [I]214-singleton should after all be mistaken . But since it strikes [you]214-singleton , perhaps it 's true . It 's a great happiness ; [I]214-singleton would not exchange it for a great deal of money . "[214-singleton]

" Yes , [I]281-rowland suppose it 's a great happiness , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland . " [I]281-rowland shall really think of [you]214-singleton as living here in a state of scandalous bliss . [I]281-rowland do n't believe it 's good for [an artist]3186-an artist to be in such brutally high spirits . "[281-rowland]

[Singleton]214-singleton stared for a moment , as if [he]214-singleton thought [Rowland]281-rowland was in earnest ; then suddenly fathoming the kindly jest , [he]214-singleton walked about [the room]487-the room , scratching [his]214-singleton head and laughing intensely to [himself]214-singleton . " And [Mr. Hudson]172-mr. hudson ? "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton said , as [Rowland]281-rowland was going ; " [I]214-singleton hope [he]172-mr. hudson is well and happy . "[214-singleton]

" [He]172-mr. hudson is very well , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland . " [He]172-mr. hudson is back at work again . "[281-rowland]

" Ah , there 's [a man]3214-a man , "[214-singleton] cried [Singleton]214-singleton , " who has taken [his]3214-a man start once for all , and does n't need to stop and ask [himself]3214-a man in fear and trembling every month or two whether [he]3214-a man is advancing or not . When [he]3214-a man stops , it 's to rest ! And where did [he]3214-a man spend [his]3214-a man summer ? "[214-singleton]

" The greater part of it at [Baden - Baden]245-baden - baden . "[281-rowland]

" Ah , that 's in [the Black Forest]3642-the black forest , "[214-singleton] cried [Singleton]214-singleton , with profound simplicity . " [They]3643-they say [you]214-singleton can make capital studies of trees there . "[214-singleton]

" No doubt , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , with a smile , laying an almost paternal hand on [the little painter]1190-the little painter 's yellow head . " Unfortunately trees are not [[Roderick]186-roderick 's line]3644-roderick 's line . Nevertheless , [he]3214-a man tells [me]214-singleton that at [Baden]245-baden - baden [he]3214-a man made some studies . Come when [you]214-singleton can , by the way , "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton added after a moment , " to [[his]3214-a man studio]873-his studio , and tell [me]214-singleton what [you]214-singleton think of something [he]3214-a man has lately begun . "[214-singleton] [Singleton]214-singleton declared that [he]214-singleton would come delightedly , and [Rowland]281-rowland left [him]214-singleton to [his]214-singleton work .

[He]214-singleton met [a number of [[his]214-singleton last winter 's friends]1192-his last winter 's friends]1191-a number of his last winter 's friends again , and called upon [Madame Grandoni]217-madame grandoni , upon [Miss Blanchard]216-miss blanchard , and upon [Gloriani]213-gloriani , shortly after [their]1191-a number of his last winter 's friends return . [The ladies]3241-the ladies gave an excellent account of [themselves]3241-the ladies . [Madame Grandoni]217-madame grandoni had been taking sea - baths at [Rimini]89-rimini , and [Miss Blanchard]216-miss blanchard painting wild flowers in [the Tyrol]90-the tyrol . [Her]217-madame grandoni complexion was somewhat browned , which was very becoming , and [her]217-madame grandoni flowers were uncommonly pretty . [Gloriani]213-gloriani had been in [Paris]9-paris and had come away in high good - humor , finding [no one there]1194-no one there , in the artist - world , cleverer than [himself]213-gloriani . [He]1195-he came in a few days to [[Roderick]186-roderick 's studio]574-roderick 's studio , one afternoon when [Rowland]281-rowland was present . [He]1195-he examined the new statue with great deference , said it was very promising , and abstained , considerately , from irritating prophecies . But [Rowland]281-rowland fancied [he]1195-he observed certain signs of inward jubilation on [the clever sculptor]1197-the clever sculptor 's part , and walked away with [him]1197-the clever sculptor to learn [his]1195-he private opinion .

" Certainly ; [I]213-gloriani liked it as well as [I]213-gloriani said , "[213-gloriani] [Gloriani]213-gloriani declared in answer to [Rowland]281-rowland 's anxious query ; " or rather [I]213-gloriani liked it a great deal better . [I]213-gloriani did n't say how much , for fear of making [[your]281-rowland friend]3646-your friend angry . But [one]3107-one can leave [him]3646-your friend alone now , for [he]3646-your friend 's coming round . [I]213-gloriani told [you]281-rowland [he]3646-your friend could n't keep up the transcendental style , and [he]3646-your friend has already broken down . Do n't [you]281-rowland see it [yourself]281-rowland , [man]3648-man ? "[213-gloriani]

" [I]281-rowland do n't particularly like this new statue , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" That 's because [you]281-rowland 're [a purist]3649-a purist . It 's deuced clever , it 's deuced knowing , it 's deuced pretty , but it is n't the topping high art of three months ago . [He]3646-your friend has taken [his]3646-your friend turn sooner than [I]213-gloriani supposed . What has happened to [him]3646-your friend ? Has [he]3646-your friend been disappointed in love ? But that 's none of [my]213-gloriani business . [I]213-gloriani congratulate [him]3646-your friend on having become [a practical man]3218-a practical man . "[213-gloriani]

[Roderick]186-roderick , however , was less to be congratulated than [Gloriani]213-gloriani had taken it into [his]186-roderick head to believe . [He]186-roderick was discontented with [his]186-roderick work , [he]186-roderick applied [himself]186-roderick to it by fits and starts , [he]186-roderick declared that [he]186-roderick did n't know what was coming over [him]186-roderick ; [he]186-roderick was turning into [a man of moods]1198-a man of moods . " Is this of necessity what [a fellow]3651-a fellow must come to "[186-roderick] - [he]186-roderick asked of [Rowland]281-rowland , with a sort of peremptory flash in [his]186-roderick eye , which seemed to imply that [[his]186-roderick companion]555-his companion had undertaken to insure [him]186-roderick against perplexities and was not fulfilling [his]186-roderick contract - " this damnable uncertainty when [he]186-roderick goes to bed at night as to whether [he]186-roderick is going to wake up in a working humor or in a swearing humor ? Have [we]3652-we only a season , over before [we]3652-we know it , in which [we]3652-we can call [our]3652-we faculties [our]3652-we own ? Six months ago [I]186-roderick could stand up to [my]186-roderick work like [a man]3214-a man , day after day , and never dream of asking [myself]186-roderick whether [I]186-roderick felt like it . But now , some mornings , it 's the very devil to get going . [My]186-roderick statue looks so bad when [I]186-roderick come into [the studio]3654-the studio that [I]186-roderick have twenty minds to smash it on the spot , and [I]186-roderick lose three or four hours in sitting there , moping and getting used to it . "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland said that [he]186-roderick supposed that this sort of thing was the lot of [every artist]3571-every artist and that the only remedy was plenty of courage and faith . And [he]186-roderick reminded [him]186-roderick of [Gloriani]213-gloriani 's having forewarned [him]186-roderick against these sterile moods the year before .

" [Gloriani]213-gloriani 's [an ass]1168-an ass ! "[186-roderick] said [Roderick]186-roderick , almost fiercely . [He]186-roderick hired a horse and began to ride with [Rowland]281-rowland on [the Campagna]59-the campagna . This delicious amusement restored [him]186-roderick in a measure to cheerfulness , but seemed to [Rowland]281-rowland on the whole not to stimulate [his]186-roderick industry . [Their]1201-their rides were always very long , and [Roderick]186-roderick insisted on making them longer by dismounting in picturesque spots and stretching [himself]186-roderick in the sun among a heap of overtangled stones . [He]186-roderick let the scorching Roman luminary beat down upon [him]186-roderick with an equanimity which [Rowland]281-rowland found it hard to emulate . But in this situation [Roderick]186-roderick talked so much amusing nonsense that , for the sake of [his]186-roderick company , [Rowland]281-rowland consented to be uncomfortable , and often forgot that , though in these diversions the days passed quickly , [they]1201-their brought forth neither high art nor low . And yet it was perhaps by [their]1201-their help , after all , that [Roderick]186-roderick secured several mornings of ardent work on [his]186-roderick new figure , and brought it to rapid completion . One afternoon , when it was finished , [Rowland]281-rowland went to look at it , and [Roderick]186-roderick asked [him]186-roderick for [his]186-roderick opinion .

" What do [you]186-roderick think [yourself]186-roderick ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland demanded , not from pusillanimity , but from real uncertainty .

" [I]186-roderick think it is curiously bad , "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick answered . " It was bad from the first ; it has fundamental vices . [I]186-roderick have shuffled them in a measure out of sight , but [I]186-roderick have not corrected them . [I]186-roderick ca n't - [I]186-roderick ca n't - [I]186-roderick ca n't ! "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick cried passionately . " [They]3656-they stare [me]186-roderick in the face - they are all [I]186-roderick see ! "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland offered several criticisms of detail , and suggested certain practicable changes . But [Roderick]186-roderick differed with [him]186-roderick on each of these points ; the thing had faults enough , but they were not those faults . [Rowland]281-rowland , unruffled , concluded by saying that whatever its faults might be , [he]186-roderick had an idea [people in general]1202-people in general would like it .

" [I]186-roderick wish to heaven [some person in particular]3657-some person in particular would buy it , and take it off [my]186-roderick hands and out of [my]186-roderick sight ! "[186-roderick] [Roderick]186-roderick cried . " What am [I]186-roderick to do now ? "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick went on . " [I]186-roderick have n't an idea . [I]186-roderick think of [subjects]3658-subjects , but they remain mere lifeless names . They are mere words - they are not images . What am [I]186-roderick to do ? "[186-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland was a trifle annoyed . " Be [a man]3214-a man , "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick was on the point of saying , " and do n't , for heaven 's sake , talk in that confoundedly querulous voice . "[186-roderick] But before [he]186-roderick had uttered the words , there rang through [the studio]3654-the studio a loud , peremptory ring at the outer door .

[Roderick]186-roderick broke into a laugh . " Talk of [the devil]3660-the devil , "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick said , " and [you]281-rowland see [his]186-roderick horns ! If that 's not [a customer]3661-a customer , it ought to be . "[186-roderick]

The door of [the studio]3654-the studio was promptly flung open , and [a lady]1205-a lady advanced to the threshold - [an imposing , voluminous person , who quite filled up the doorway]1206-an imposing , voluminous person , who quite filled up the doorway . [Rowland]281-rowland immediately felt that [he]186-roderick had seen [her]1205-a lady before , but [he]186-roderick recognized [her]1205-a lady only when [she]1205-a lady moved forward and disclosed [an attendant]1207-an attendant in the person of [a little bright - eyed , elderly gentleman , with a bristling white moustache]1208-a little bright - eyed , elderly gentleman , with a bristling white moustache . Then [he]186-roderick remembered that just a year before [he]186-roderick and [[his]186-roderick companion]555-his companion had seen in [the Ludovisi gardens]1210-the ludovisi gardens [a wonderfully beautiful girl]1211-a wonderfully beautiful girl , strolling in [the train of [this conspicuous couple]1213-this conspicuous couple]1212-the train of this conspicuous couple . [He]186-roderick looked for [her]1211-a wonderfully beautiful girl now , and in a moment [she]1211-a wonderfully beautiful girl appeared , following [[her]1211-a wonderfully beautiful girl companions]751-her companions with the same nonchalant step as before , and leading [her]1211-a wonderfully beautiful girl great snow - white poodle , decorated with motley ribbons . [The elder lady]632-the elder lady offered [the two young men]608-the two young men a sufficiently gracious salute ; [the little old gentleman]1217-the little old gentleman bowed and smiled with extreme alertness . [The young girl]659-the young girl , without casting a glance either at [Roderick]186-roderick or at [Rowland]281-rowland , looked about for a chair , and , on perceiving one , sank into it listlessly , pulled [her]659-the young girl poodle towards [her]659-the young girl , and began to rearrange [his]1217-the little old gentleman top - knot . [Rowland]281-rowland saw that , even with [her]659-the young girl eyes dropped , [her]659-the young girl beauty was still dazzling .

" [I]632-the elder lady trust [we]608-the two young men are at liberty to enter , "[632-the elder lady] said [the elder lady]632-the elder lady , with majesty . " [We]608-the two young men were told that [Mr. Hudson]172-mr. hudson had no fixed day , and that [we]608-the two young men might come at any time . Let [us]608-the two young men not disturb [you]281-rowland . "[632-the elder lady]

[Roderick]186-roderick , as [one of the lesser lights of [the Roman art - world]1221-the roman art - world]1220-one of the lesser lights of the roman art - world , had not hitherto been subject to incursions from [inquisitive tourists]1222-inquisitive tourists , and , having no regular reception day , was not versed in the usual formulas of welcome . [He]186-roderick said nothing , and [Rowland]281-rowland , looking at [him]186-roderick , saw that [he]186-roderick was looking amazedly at [the young girl]659-the young girl and was apparently unconscious of everything else . " By [Jove]251-jove ! "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick cried precipitately , " it 's [that goddess of [the Villa Ludovisi]3663-the villa ludovisi]3662-that goddess of the villa ludovisi ! " [I]186-roderick have been in many [a studio]1032-a studio ! "[186-roderick] [he]186-roderick said , with [his]186-roderick finger on [his]186-roderick nose and a strong Italian accent .

" [We]1226-we are going about everywhere , "[555-his companion] said [[his]186-roderick companion]555-his companion . " [I]555-his companion am passionately fond of art ! "[555-his companion]

[Rowland]281-rowland smiled sympathetically , and let [them]1226-we turn to [Roderick]186-roderick 's statue . There was nothing bold in [her]1228-the beautiful young mistress of the poodle , who by this time had looked up and was gazing straight at him look ; it expressed a kind of languid , imperturbable indifference . [Her]1228-the beautiful young mistress of the poodle , who by this time had looked up and was gazing straight at him beauty was extraordinary ; it grew and grew as [the young man]347-the young man observed [her]1228-the beautiful young mistress of the poodle , who by this time had looked up and was gazing straight at him . In such a face the maidenly custom of averted eyes and ready blushes would have seemed an anomaly ; nature had produced it for [man]3648-man 's delight and meant that it should surrender itself freely and coldly to admiration . It was not immediately apparent , however , that [the young lady]716-the young lady found an answering entertainment in the physiognomy of [[her]716-the young lady host]1232-her host ; [she]716-the young lady turned [her]716-the young lady head after a moment and looked idly round [the room]487-the room , and at last let [her]716-the young lady eyes rest on the statue of [the woman seated]1234-the woman seated . "[716-the young lady] And on [Rowland]281-rowland 's caressing [him]347-the young man : " [His]347-the young man name is [Stenterello]252-stenterello , "[716-the young lady] [she]716-the young lady added . "[716-the young lady]

" [[My]632-the elder lady dear]3110-my dear , [[my]632-the elder lady dear]3110-my dear , remember where [you]3110-my dear are ! " [I]659-the young girl am teaching [him]186-roderick to talk for [me]659-the young girl , "[659-the young girl] [the young girl]659-the young girl went on , without heeding [[her]659-the young girl mother]369-her mother ; " to say little things in society . " [He]186-roderick is a wonderful beast , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" It is not for that [I]659-the young girl care about [him]186-roderick . It is for [himself]186-roderick . [He]186-roderick is better than [the prince]3484-the prince . "[659-the young girl]

" [[My]1240-the mother dear]3110-my dear , [[my]1240-the mother dear]3110-my dear ! [Rowland]281-rowland remembered that when [[their]1243-their unknown visitors]1244-their unknown visitors had passed before [them]1243-their , a year previous , in [the Villa Ludovisi]38-the villa ludovisi , [Roderick]186-roderick and [he]186-roderick had exchanged conjectures as to [their]1243-their nationality and social quality . [Roderick]186-roderick had declared that [they]1243-their were [old - world people]1245-old - world people ; but [Rowland]281-rowland now needed no telling to feel that [he]632-the elder lady might claim [the elder lady]632-the elder lady as [a fellow - countrywoman]1247-a fellow - countrywoman . [She]632-the elder lady was [a person of what is called a great deal of presence , with the faded traces , artfully revived here and there , of once brilliant beauty]1248-a person of what is called a great deal of presence , with the faded traces , artfully revived here and there , of once brilliant beauty . [[Her]632-the elder lady daughter]491-her daughter had come lawfully by [her]632-the elder lady loveliness , but [Rowland]281-rowland mentally made the distinction that [the mother]1240-the mother was silly and that [the daughter]1251-the daughter was not . [The mother]1240-the mother had a very silly mouth - a mouth , [Rowland]281-rowland suspected , capable of expressing an inordinate degree of unreason . [The young girl]659-the young girl , in spite of [her]659-the young girl childish satisfaction in [her]659-the young girl poodle , was not [a person of feeble understanding]1254-a person of feeble understanding . [Rowland]281-rowland received an impression that , for reasons of [her]632-the elder lady own , [she]632-the elder lady was playing a part . What was the part and what were [her]632-the elder lady reasons ? [She]632-the elder lady was interesting ; [Rowland]281-rowland wondered what were [her]632-the elder lady domestic secrets . If [[her]659-the young girl mother]369-her mother was [a daughter of [the great Republic]1257-the great republic]1256-a daughter of the great republic , it was to be supposed that [the young girl]659-the young girl was [a flower of [the American soil]1260-the american soil]1259-a flower of the american soil ; but [her]659-the young girl beauty had a robustness and tone uncommon in the somewhat facile loveliness of [our]1261-our western maidenhood . " [I]1264-he have not done [my]1264-he duty , "[1264-he] [he]1264-he said , " in not announcing [these ladies]1158-these ladies . [Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light , [Miss Light]254-miss light ! "[1264-he]

[Rowland]281-rowland was not materially the wiser for this information , but [Roderick]186-roderick was aroused by it to the exercise of some slight hospitality . [He]186-roderick altered the light , pulled forward two or three figures , and made an apology for not having more to show . " [I]186-roderick do n't pretend to have anything of an exhibition - [I]186-roderick am only [a novice]3678-a novice . "[186-roderick]

" Indeed ? - [a novice]3678-a novice ! For [a novice]3678-a novice this is very well , "[253-mrs. light] [Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light declared . " [Cavaliere]255-the cavaliere , [we]3681-we have seen nothing better than this . "[253-mrs. light]

[The Cavaliere]255-the cavaliere smiled rapturously . " It is stupendous ! "[255-the cavaliere] [he]255-the cavaliere murmured . " And [we]3681-we have been to all [the studios]3682-the studios . "[255-the cavaliere]

" Not to all - heaven forbid ! "[253-mrs. light] cried [Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light . " But to a number that [I]253-mrs. light have had pointed out by [artistic friends]3683-artistic friends . " [The artists]3690-the artists are all crazy about [her]3689-my beautiful daughter . " [She]3689-my beautiful daughter is very beautiful , "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland said , gravely .

[Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light , who through [her]253-mrs. light long , gold - cased glass was looking a little at everything , and at nothing as if [she]253-mrs. light saw it , interrupted [her]253-mrs. light random murmurs and exclamations , and surveyed [Rowland]281-rowland from head to foot . [She]253-mrs. light looked at [him]1268-him all over ; apparently [he]1268-him had not been mentioned to [her]253-mrs. light as a feature of [[Roderick]186-roderick 's establishment]1269-roderick 's establishment . It was the gaze , [Rowland]281-rowland felt , which [the vigilant and ambitious mamma of [a beautiful daughter]1271-a beautiful daughter]1270-the vigilant and ambitious mamma of a beautiful daughter has always at [her]1270-the vigilant and ambitious mamma of a beautiful daughter command for [well - dressed young men of candid physiognomy]1272-well - dressed young men of candid physiognomy . [Her]253-mrs. light inspection in this case seemed satisfactory . " Are [you]281-rowland also [an artist]3186-an artist ? "[253-mrs. light] [she]253-mrs. light inquired with an almost caressing inflection . "[253-mrs. light]

But [Rowland]281-rowland answered simply the formal question - not the latent one . " Dear [me]281-rowland , no ; [I]281-rowland am only [a friend of [Mr. Hudson]172-mr. hudson]3696-a friend of mr. hudson . "[281-rowland]

[Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light , with a sigh , returned to [the statues]1273-the statues , and after mistaking [the Adam]211-the adam for [a gladiator]1274-a gladiator , and [the Eve]226-eve for [a Pocahontas]1275-a pocahontas , declared that [she]253-mrs. light could not judge of such things unless [she]253-mrs. light saw them in the marble . [Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light , having failed to make [her]253-mrs. light own fortune in matrimony , has transferred [her]253-mrs. light hopes to [[her]253-mrs. light daughter]491-her daughter , and nursed [them]3810-them till [they]3810-them have become a kind of monomania . [I]1311-this judicious critic ' m sure that if [you]3811-you go in some evening unannounced , [you]3811-you will find [her]253-mrs. light scanning the tea - leaves in [her]253-mrs. light cup , or telling [[her]253-mrs. light daughter]491-her daughter 's fortune with a greasy pack of cards , preserved for the purpose . [She]253-mrs. light promises [her]253-mrs. light [a prince]3813-a prince - [a reigning prince]3814-a reigning prince . At the worst [she]253-mrs. light would take [a duke]3807-a duke , [an English lord]3763-an english lord , or even [a young American with a proper number of millions]3819-a young american with a proper number of millions . [The poor woman]3820-the poor woman must be rather uncomfortable . [She]253-mrs. light is always building [castles]3821-castles and knocking them down again - always casting [her]253-mrs. light nets and pulling them in . If [[her]253-mrs. light daughter]491-her daughter were less of [a beauty]3823-a beauty , [her]253-mrs. light transparent ambition would be very ridiculous ; but there is something in [the girl]3228-the girl , as [one]3107-one looks at [her]3228-the girl , that seems to make it very possible [she]3228-the girl is marked out for one of those wonderful romantic fortunes that history now and then relates . ' Who , after all , was [the Empress of the French]3826-the empress of the french ? ' [Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light is forever saying . " And what does [Christina]192-christina say ? "[217-madame grandoni]

" [She]192-christina makes no scruple , as [you]3829-you know , of saying that [[her]192-christina mother]369-her mother is [a fool]991-a fool . What [she]192-christina thinks , heaven knows . [She]192-christina is excessively proud , and thinks [herself]192-christina good enough to occupy [the highest station in [the world]483-the world]3832-the highest station in the world ; but [she]192-christina knows that [[her]192-christina mother]369-her mother talks nonsense , and that even [a beautiful girl]3835-a beautiful girl may look awkward in making unsuccessful advances . " [Your]217-madame grandoni report is as solid , "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland said to [Madame Grandoni]217-madame grandoni , thanking [her]217-madame grandoni , " as if it had been prepared for [the Academy of Sciences]3839-the academy of sciences ; "[281-rowland] and [he]1312-you congratulated [himself]1312-you on having listened to it when , a couple of days later , [Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light and [[her]253-mrs. light daughter]491-her daughter , attended by [the Cavaliere]255-the cavaliere and the poodle , came to [[his]1312-you rooms]1278-his rooms to look at [Roderick]186-roderick 's statues . " It 's an odd jumble , "[192-christina] [she]192-christina said frankly . " Some things are very pretty - some are very ugly . But [I]192-christina like ugly things , when they have a certain look . [The Cavaliere]1279-the cavaliere approached [Rowland]281-rowland , to express the pleasure [he]1279-the cavaliere had derived from [his]1279-the cavaliere beautiful " collection . "[281-rowland] [His]1279-the cavaliere smile was exquisitely bland , [his]1279-the cavaliere accent appealing , caressing , insinuating . But [he]1279-the cavaliere gave [Rowland]281-rowland an odd sense of looking at a little waxen image , adjusted to perform certain gestures and emit certain sounds . It had once contained a soul , but the soul had leaked out . Nevertheless , [Rowland]281-rowland reflected , there are more profitless things than mere sound and gesture , in a consummate Italian . And [the Cavaliere]1279-the cavaliere , too , had soul enough left to desire to speak a few words on [his]1279-the cavaliere own account , and call [Rowland]281-rowland 's attention to the fact that [he]1279-the cavaliere was not , after all , [a hired cicerone]1320-a hired cicerone , but [an ancient Roman gentleman]1321-an ancient roman gentleman . [Rowland]281-rowland felt sorry for [him]1279-the cavaliere ; [he]1279-the cavaliere hardly knew why . [He]1279-the cavaliere assured [him]1279-the cavaliere in a friendly fashion that [he]1279-the cavaliere must come again ; that [[his]1279-the cavaliere house]1322-his house was always at [his]1279-the cavaliere service . [The Cavaliere]1279-the cavaliere bowed down to the ground . " [You]253-mrs. light do [me]1279-the cavaliere too much honor , "[1279-the cavaliere] [he]1279-the cavaliere murmured . " [I]192-christina beg [your]281-rowland pardon , "[192-christina] said [Christina]192-christina .
