"[325-roderick]

" Oh , [you]325-roderick 're in love ! "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , not very logically . It must be confessed , at any cost , that this assertion was made for the sole purpose of hearing [Roderick]325-roderick deny it .

But it quite failed of [its]2825-its aim . [Roderick]325-roderick gave a liberal shrug of [his]2826-he shoulders and an irresponsible toss of [his]2826-he head . " Call it what [you]281-rowland please ! [I]2826-he am past caring for names . "[2826-he]

[Rowland]281-rowland had not only been illogical , [he]2826-he had also been slightly disingenuous . [He]2826-he did not believe that [[his]2826-he companion]555-his companion was in love ; [he]2826-he had argued the false to learn the true . The true was that [Roderick]325-roderick was again , in some degree , under a charm , and that [he]2826-he found a healing virtue in [Mary]193-mary garland 's presence , indisposed though [he]2826-he was to admit it . [He]2826-he had said , shortly before , that [her]193-mary garland voice was sweet to [his]2826-he ear ; and this was a promising beginning . If [her]193-mary garland voice was sweet it was probable that [her]193-mary garland glance was not amiss , that [her]193-mary garland touch had a quiet magic , and that [her]193-mary garland whole personal presence had learned the art of not being irritating . So [Rowland]281-rowland reasoned , and invested [Mary Garland]193-mary garland with a still finer loveliness .

It was true that [she]193-mary garland [herself]193-mary garland helped [him]2826-he little to definite conclusions , and that [he]2826-he remained in puzzled doubt as to whether these happy touches were still a matter of the heart , or had become simply a matter of the conscience . [He]2826-he watched for signs that [she]193-mary garland rejoiced in [Roderick]325-roderick 's renewed acceptance of [her]193-mary garland society ; but it seemed to [him]2826-he that [she]193-mary garland was on [her]193-mary garland guard against interpreting it too largely . It was now [her]193-mary garland turn - [he]2826-he fancied that [he]2826-he sometimes gathered from certain nameless indications of glance and tone and gesture - it was now [her]193-mary garland turn to be indifferent , to care for other things . Again and again [Rowland]281-rowland asked [himself]281-rowland what these things were that [Miss Garland]182-miss garland might be supposed to care for , to the injury of ideal constancy ; and again , having designated them , [he]2826-he divided them into two portions . One was that larger experience , in general , which had come to [her]193-mary garland with [her]193-mary garland arrival in [Europe]1-europe ; the vague sense , borne in upon [her]193-mary garland imagination , that there were more things one might do with [one]3107-one 's life than youth and ignorance and [Northampton]2-northampton had dreamt of ; the revision of old pledges in the light of new emotions . The other was the experience , in especial , of [Rowland]281-rowland 's - what ? Here [Rowland]281-rowland always paused , in perfect sincerity , to measure afresh [his]2826-he possible claim to [the young girl]659-the young girl 's regard . What might [he]2826-he call it ? It had been more than civility and yet it had been less than devotion . [It]2830-it had spoken of a desire to serve , but it had said nothing of a hope of reward . Nevertheless , [Rowland]281-rowland 's fancy hovered about the idea that it was recompensable , and [his]2826-he reflections ended in a reverie which perhaps did not define it , but at least , on each occasion , added a little to its volume . Since [Miss Garland]182-miss garland had asked [him]2826-he as a sort of favor to [herself]182-miss garland to come also to [Switzerland]74-switzerland , [he]2826-he thought it possible [she]182-miss garland might let [him]2826-he know whether [he]2826-he seemed to have effectively served [her]182-miss garland . The days passed without [her]182-miss garland doing so , and at last [Rowland]281-rowland walked away to [an isolated eminence some five miles from [the inn]956-the inn]2831-an isolated eminence some five miles from the inn and murmured to the silent rocks that [she]182-miss garland was ungrateful . Listening nature seemed not to contradict [him]2826-he , so that , on the morrow , [he]2826-he asked [the young girl]659-the young girl , with an infinitesimal touch of irony , whether it struck [her]659-the young girl that [his]2826-he deflection from [his]2826-he Florentine plan had been attended with brilliant results .

" Why , [we]5259-we are delighted that [you]281-rowland are with [us]5259-we ! "[659-the young girl] [she]659-the young girl answered .

[He]2826-he was anything but satisfied with this ; it seemed to imply that [she]659-the young girl had forgotten that [she]659-the young girl had solemnly asked [him]2826-he to come . [He]2836-he was careful not to tell [her]659-the young girl that [he]2836-he intended to leave [them]2837-them . One day , shortly after this , as [the two young men]608-the two young men sat at [the inn]956-the inn - door watching the sunset , which on that evening was very striking and lurid , [Rowland]281-rowland made an attempt to sound [[his]2836-he companion]555-his companion 's present sentiment touching [Christina Light]192-christina . " [I]2836-he wonder where [she]192-christina is , "[2836-he] [he]2836-he said , " and what sort of a life [she]192-christina is leading [[her]192-christina prince]3815-her prince . "[2836-he]

[Roderick]325-roderick at first made no response . [He]2836-he was watching a figure on [the summit of [some distant rocks]2842-some distant rocks , opposite to [them]2837-them]2841-the summit of some distant rocks , opposite to them . [The figure]1914-the figure was apparently descending into [the valley]2844-the valley , and in relief against the crimson screen of the western sky , it looked gigantic . " [Christina Light]192-christina ? "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick at last repeated , as if arousing [himself]325-roderick from a reverie . " Where [she]192-christina is ? It 's extraordinary how little [I]325-roderick care ! "[325-roderick]

" Have [you]281-rowland , then , completely got over it ? "[325-roderick]

To this [Roderick]325-roderick made no direct reply ; [he]2836-he sat brooding a while . " [She]192-christina 's [a humbug]5264-a humbug ! "[2836-he] [he]2836-he presently exclaimed .

" Possibly ! "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland . " But [I]281-rowland have known worse ones . "[281-rowland]

" [She]192-christina disappointed [me]325-roderick ! "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick continued in the same tone .

" Had [she]192-christina , then , really given [you]606-his friend hopes ? "[325-roderick]

" Oh , do n't recall it ! "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick cried . " Why the devil should [I]325-roderick think of it ? It was only three months ago , but it seems like ten years . "[325-roderick] [[His]2836-he friend]606-his friend said nothing more , and after a while [he]2836-he went on of [his]2836-he own accord . " [I]2836-he believed there was a future in it all ! [She]192-christina pleased [me]2836-he - pleased [me]2836-he ; and when [an artist]3186-an artist - such as [I]2836-he was - is pleased , [you]606-his friend know ! "[2836-he] And [he]2836-he paused again . " [You]606-his friend never saw [her]192-christina as [I]2846-i did ; [you]606-his friend never heard [her]192-christina in [her]192-christina great moments . But there is no use talking about that ! At first [she]192-christina would n't regard [me]2846-i seriously ; [she]192-christina chaffed [me]2846-i and made light of [me]2846-i . But at last [I]2846-i forced [her]192-christina to admit [I]2846-i was [a great man]3322-a great man . Think of that , [sir]3318-sir ! [Christina Light]192-christina called [me]2846-i [a great man]3322-a great man . [A great man]3322-a great man was what [she]192-christina was looking for , and [we]5270-we agreed to find [our]5270-we happiness for life in [each other]645-each other . To please [me]2846-i [she]192-christina promised not to marry till [I]2846-i gave [her]192-christina leave . [I]2846-i was not in a marrying way [myself]2846-i , but it was damnation to think of [another man]1035-another man possessing [her]192-christina . To spare [my]2846-i sensibilities , [she]192-christina promised to turn off [[her]192-christina prince]3815-her prince , and the idea of [her]192-christina doing so made [me]2846-i as happy as to see a perfect statue shaping itself in the block . [You]5274-you have seen how [she]192-christina kept [her]192-christina promise ! When [I]2846-i learned it , it was as if the statue had suddenly cracked and turned hideous . [She]192-christina died for [me]2846-i , like that ! "[2846-i] And [he]2846-i snapped [his]2846-i fingers . " Was it wounded vanity , disappointed desire , betrayed confidence ? [I]2846-i am sure [I]2846-i do n't know ; [you]5274-you certainly have some name for it . "[2846-i]

" [The poor girl]4834-the poor girl did the best [she]4834-the poor girl could , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" If that was [her]4834-the poor girl best , so much the worse for [her]4834-the poor girl ! [I]2846-i have hardly thought of [her]4834-the poor girl these two months , but [I]2846-i have not forgiven [her]4834-the poor girl . "[2846-i]

" [I]325-roderick do n't pity [her]4834-the poor girl ! "[325-roderick] said [Roderick]325-roderick . Then [he]2846-i relapsed into silence , and [the two]1820-the two sat watching the colossal figure as it made its way downward along the jagged silhouette of the rocks . " Who is [this mighty man]5276-this mighty man , "[325-roderick] cried [Roderick]325-roderick at last , " and what is [he]5276-this mighty man coming down upon [us]1820-the two for ? " For ten minutes , at least , "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick rejoined , " [he]5276-this mighty man will have been [a great man]3322-a great man ! "[325-roderick] At this moment [the figure]1914-the figure sank beneath the horizon line and became invisible in the uncertain light . Suddenly [Roderick]325-roderick said , " [I]325-roderick would like to see [her]1914-the figure once more - simply to look at [her]1914-the figure . "[325-roderick]

" [I]281-rowland would not advise it , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" It was [her]1914-the figure beauty that did it ! "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick went on . " It was all [her]1914-the figure beauty ; in comparison , the rest was nothing . And [I]325-roderick had made it [mine]325-roderick - [no one else]5282-no one else had studied [it]5281-my property as [I]325-roderick had , [no one else]5282-no one else understood it . " [I]281-rowland would not advise it , "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland repeated .

" That 's right , dear [Rowland]281-rowland , "[325-roderick] said [Roderick]325-roderick ; " do n't advise ! That 's no use now . "[325-roderick]

The dusk meanwhile had thickened , and [they]2849-they had not perceived a figure approaching [them]2849-they across [the open space in front of [the house]3246-the house]2850-the open space in front of the house . Suddenly it stepped into the circle of light projected from the door and windows , and [they]2849-they beheld [little Sam Singleton]214-singleton stopping to stare at [them]2849-they . [He]214-singleton was [the giant whom [they]2849-they had seen descending along [the rocks]4532-the rocks]2852-the giant whom they had seen descending along the rocks . When this was made apparent [Roderick]325-roderick was seized with a fit of intense hilarity - it was the first time [he]2854-he had laughed in three months . [Singleton]214-singleton , who carried a knapsack and walking - staff , received from [Rowland]281-rowland the friendliest welcome . [He]214-singleton was in the serenest possible humor , and if in the way of luggage [his]214-singleton knapsack contained nothing but a comb and a second shirt , [he]214-singleton produced from it a dozen admirable sketches . [He]214-singleton had been trudging over half [Switzerland]74-switzerland and making everywhere the most vivid pictorial notes . [They]2855-they were mostly in a box at [Interlaken]156-interlaken , and in gratitude for [Rowland]281-rowland 's appreciation , [he]214-singleton presently telegraphed for [his]214-singleton box , which , according to the excellent Swiss method , was punctually delivered by post . The nights were cold , and [[our]2856-our friends]839-our friends , with [three or four other chance sojourners]2858-three or four other chance sojourners , sat in - doors over a fire of logs . Even with [Roderick]325-roderick sitting moodily in the outer shadow [they]2849-they made a sympathetic little circle , and [they]2849-they turned over [Singleton]214-singleton 's drawings , while [he]214-singleton perched in the chimney - corner , blushing and grinning , with [his]214-singleton feet on the rounds of [his]214-singleton chair . [He]214-singleton had been pedestrianizing for six weeks , and [he]214-singleton was glad to rest awhile at [Engelthal]155-engelthal . It was an economic repose , however , for [he]214-singleton sallied forth every morning , with [his]214-singleton sketching tools on [his]214-singleton back , in search of material for new studies . [Roderick]325-roderick 's hilarity , after the first evening , had subsided , and [he]214-singleton watched [the little painter]1190-the little painter 's serene activity with a gravity that was almost portentous . [Singleton]214-singleton , who was not in the secret of [his]214-singleton personal misfortunes , still treated [him]214-singleton with timid frankness as the rising star of American art . [Roderick]325-roderick had said to [Rowland]281-rowland , at first , that [Singleton]214-singleton reminded [him]214-singleton of some curious little insect with a remarkable mechanical instinct in its antennae ; but as the days went by it was apparent that [the modest landscapist]2860-the modest landscapist 's unflagging industry grew to have an oppressive meaning for [him]214-singleton . It pointed a moral , and [Roderick]325-roderick used to sit and con the moral as [he]214-singleton saw it figured in [Singleton]214-singleton 's bent back , on [the hot hill - sides]2861-the hot hill - sides , protruding from beneath [his]214-singleton white umbrella . One day [he]214-singleton wandered up [a long slope]2862-a long slope and overtook [him]214-singleton as [he]214-singleton sat at work ; [Singleton]214-singleton related the incident afterwards to [Rowland]281-rowland , who , after giving [him]214-singleton in [Rome]4-rome a hint of [Roderick]325-roderick 's aberrations , had strictly kept [his]214-singleton own counsel .

" Are [you]214-singleton always like this ? "[325-roderick] said [Roderick]325-roderick , in almost sepulchral accents .

" Like this ? "[214-singleton] repeated [Singleton]214-singleton , blinking confusedly , with an alarmed conscience .

" [You]214-singleton remind [me]214-singleton of a watch that never runs down . If [one]3107-one listens hard one hears [you]214-singleton always - tic - tic , tic - tic . "[214-singleton]

" Oh , [I]214-singleton see , "[214-singleton] said [Singleton]214-singleton , beaming ingenuously . " [I]214-singleton am very equable . "[214-singleton]

" [You]214-singleton are very equable , yes . And do [you]214-singleton find it pleasant to be equable ? "[214-singleton]

[Singleton]214-singleton turned and grinned more brightly , while [he]214-singleton sucked the water from [his]214-singleton camel's - hair brush . Then , with a quickened sense of [his]214-singleton indebtedness to [a Providence that had endowed [him]214-singleton with intrinsic facilities]2863-a providence that had endowed him with intrinsic facilities , " Oh , delightful ! "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton exclaimed .

[Roderick]325-roderick stood looking at [him]214-singleton a moment . " Damnation ! "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton said at last , solemnly , and turned [his]214-singleton back .

One morning , shortly after this , [Rowland]281-rowland and [Roderick]325-roderick took a long walk . [They]2864-they had walked before in a dozen different directions , but [they]2864-they had not yet crossed a charming little wooded pass , which shut in [[their]2864-they valley]2865-their valley on one side and descended into [the vale of [Engelberg]158-engelberg]2866-the vale of engelberg . In coming from [Lucerne]147-lucerne [they]2864-they had approached [[their]2864-they inn]2867-their inn by this path , and , feeling that [they]2864-they knew it , had hitherto neglected [it]2867-their inn in favor of untrodden ways . But at last the list of these was exhausted , and [Rowland]281-rowland proposed the walk to [Engelberg]158-engelberg as a novelty . [The place]3197-the place is half bleak and half pastoral ; [a huge white monastery]2869-a huge white monastery rises abruptly from [the green floor of [the valley]2844-the valley]2870-the green floor of the valley and complicates [its]2869-a huge white monastery picturesqueness with an element rare in [Swiss scenery]2872-swiss scenery . Hard by is [a group of chalets and [inns]2045-inns , with the usual appurtenances of [a prosperous Swiss]2875-a prosperous swiss resort]2873-a group of chalets and inns , with the usual appurtenances of a prosperous swiss resort - lean brown guides in [baggy homespun]2876-baggy homespun , lounging under carved wooden galleries , stacks of alpenstocks in every doorway , sun - scorched [Englishmen without shirt - collars]2877-englishmen without shirt - collars . [[Our]2878-our two friends]2186-our two friends sat a while at the door of [an inn]2880-an inn , discussing a pint of wine , and then [Roderick]325-roderick , who was indefatigable , announced [his]2881-his intention of climbing to [a certain rocky pinnacle which overhung [the valley]2844-the valley]2882-a certain rocky pinnacle which overhung the valley , and , according to the testimony of [one of [the guides]2885-the guides]2884-one of the guides , commanded a view of [the Lake of [Lucerne]147-lucerne]2886-the lake of lucerne . To go and come back was only a matter of an hour , but [Rowland]281-rowland , with the prospect of [his]2881-his homeward trudge before [him]2881-his , confessed to a preference for lounging on [his]2881-his bench , or at most strolling a trifle farther and taking a look at [the monastery]2887-the monastery . [Roderick]325-roderick went off alone , and [[his]2881-his companion]555-his companion after a while bent [his]555-his companion steps to [the monasterial church]2889-the monasterial church . [It]2889-the monasterial church was remarkable , like most of [the churches of [Catholic Switzerland]159-catholic switzerland]2890-the churches of catholic switzerland , for a hideous style of devotional ornament ; but [it]2889-the monasterial church had a certain cold and musty picturesqueness , and [Rowland]281-rowland lingered [there]3420-there with some tenderness for Alpine piety . While [he]2881-his was near [the high - altar]2892-the high - altar [some people]4751-some people came in at the west door ; but [he]2881-his did not notice [them]4751-some people , and was presently engaged in deciphering a curious old German epitaph on one of the mural tablets . At last [he]2881-his turned away , wondering whether its syntax or its theology was the more uncomfortable , and , to this infinite surprise , found [himself]2881-his confronted with [the Prince]3484-the prince and [Princess Casamassima]281-rowland .

The surprise on [Christina]192-christina 's part , for an instant , was equal , and at first [she]192-christina seemed disposed to turn away without letting it give place to a greeting . [The prince]3484-the prince , however , saluted gravely , and then [Christina]192-christina , in silence , put out [her]192-christina hand . [Rowland]281-rowland immediately asked whether [they]2896-they were staying at [Engelberg]158-engelberg , but [Christina]192-christina only looked at [him]2881-his without speaking . [The prince]3484-the prince answered [his]3484-the prince questions , and related that [they]2896-they had been making a month 's tour in [Switzerland]74-switzerland , that at [Lucerne]147-lucerne [[his]3484-the prince wife]3167-his wife had been somewhat obstinately indisposed , and that [the physician]2899-the physician had recommended a week 's trial of the tonic air and goat 's milk of [Engelberg]158-engelberg . The scenery , said [the prince]3484-the prince , was stupendous , but the life was terribly sad - and [they]2896-they had three days more ! It was a blessing , [he]3484-the prince urbanely added , to see a good Roman face .

[Christina]192-christina 's attitude , [her]192-christina solemn silence and [her]192-christina penetrating gaze seemed to [Rowland]281-rowland , at first , to savor of affectation ; but [he]2881-his presently perceived that [she]192-christina was profoundly agitated , and that [she]192-christina was afraid of betraying [herself]192-christina . " Do let [us]2896-they leave this hideous edifice , "[192-christina] [she]192-christina said ; " there are things here that set [one]3107-one 's teeth on edge . "[192-christina] [They]2896-they moved slowly to the door , and when [they]2896-they stood outside , in the sunny coolness of [the valley]2844-the valley , [she]192-christina turned to [Rowland]281-rowland and said , " [I]192-christina am extremely glad to see [you]281-rowland . "[192-christina] Then [she]192-christina glanced about [her]192-christina and observed , against the wall of [the church]4439-the church , an old stone seat . And for fear of being forced to betray [his]2912-he suspicion of the cause of [her]2913-her change , [he]2912-he took refuge in a commonplace . " [[Your]281-rowland mother]3145-your mother , [I]192-christina hope , is well . "[192-christina]

" [[My]192-christina mother]3224-my mother is in the enjoyment of superb health , and may be seen every evening at [the Casino]779-the casino , at [the Baths of [Lucca]161-lucca]5306-the baths of lucca , confiding to [every new - comer]5307-every new - comer that [she]3224-my mother has married [[her]3224-my mother daughter]491-her daughter to [a pearl of [a prince]3813-a prince]5309-a pearl of a prince . "[192-christina]

[Rowland]281-rowland was anxious for news of [[Mrs. Light]253-mrs. light 's companion]2914-mrs. light 's companion , and the natural course was frankly to inquire about [him]2914-mrs. light 's companion . " And [the Cavaliere Giacosa]255-the cavaliere is well ? "[2912-he] [he]2912-he asked .

[Christina]192-christina hesitated , but [she]192-christina betrayed no other embarrassment . " [The Cavaliere]1279-the cavaliere has retired to [[his]1279-the cavaliere native city of [Ancona]93-ancona]5312-his native city of ancona , upon a pension , for the rest of [his]1279-the cavaliere natural life . [He]1279-the cavaliere is [a very good old man]5313-a very good old man ! "[192-christina]

" [I]281-rowland have a great regard for [him]1279-the cavaliere , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , gravely , at the same time that [he]2912-he privately wondered whether [the Cavaliere]1279-the cavaliere 's pension was paid by [Prince Casamassima]273-prince casamassima for services rendered in connection with [his]2914-mrs. light 's companion marriage . Had [the Cavaliere]1279-the cavaliere received [his]2914-mrs. light 's companion commission ? " And what do [you]2917-i do , "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland continued , " on leaving [this place]3129-this place ? "[281-rowland]

" [We]5315-we go to [Italy]24-italy - [we]5315-we go to [Naples]52-naples . "[2917-i] [She]2917-i rose and stood silent a moment , looking down [the valley]2844-the valley . The figure of [Prince Casamassima]273-prince casamassima appeared in the distance , balancing [his]2914-mrs. light 's companion white umbrella . As [her]2917-i eyes rested upon it , [Rowland]281-rowland imagined that [he]2912-he saw something deeper in the strange expression which had lurked in [her]2917-i face while [he]2912-he talked to [her]2917-i . At first [he]2912-he had been dazzled by [her]2917-i blooming beauty , to which the lapse of weeks had only added splendor ; then [he]2912-he had seen a heavier ray in the light of [her]2917-i eye - a sinister intimation of sadness and bitterness . It was the outward mark of [her]2917-i sacrificed ideal . [Her]2917-i eyes grew cold as [she]2917-i looked at [[her]2917-i husband]350-her husband , and when , after a moment , [she]2917-i turned them upon [Rowland]281-rowland , [they]2920-they struck [him]2912-he as intensely tragical . [He]2912-he felt a singular mixture of sympathy and dread ; [he]2912-he wished to give [her]2917-i a proof of friendship , and yet it seemed to [him]2912-he that [she]2917-i had now turned [her]2917-i face in a direction where friendship was impotent to interpose . [She]2917-i half read [his]2912-he feelings , apparently , and [she]2917-i gave a beautiful , sad smile . " [I]2917-i hope [we]5316-we may never meet again ! "[2917-i] [she]2917-i said . And as [Rowland]281-rowland gave [her]2917-i a protesting look - " [You]2917-i have seen [me]2917-i at [my]2917-i best . [I]2917-i wish to tell [you]2917-i solemnly , [I]2917-i was sincere ! [I]2917-i know appearances are against [me]2917-i , "[2917-i] [she]2917-i went on quickly . " There is a great deal [I]2917-i ca n't tell [you]2917-i . Perhaps [you]2917-i have guessed it ; [I]2917-i care very little . [You]2917-i know , at any rate , [I]2917-i did [my]2917-i best . It would n't serve ; [I]2917-i was beaten and broken ; [they]5317-they were stronger than [I.]2917-i Now it 's another affair ! "[2917-i]

" It seems to [me]281-rowland [you]2917-i have a large chance for happiness yet , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , vaguely .

" Happiness ? [I]2917-i mean to cultivate rapture ; [I]2917-i mean to go in for bliss ineffable ! [You]2917-i remember [I]2917-i told [you]2917-i that [I]2917-i was , in part , [the world]483-the world 's and the devil 's . Now [they]5317-they have taken [me]2917-i all . It was [their]5317-they choice ; may [they]5317-they never repent ! "[2917-i]

" [I]281-rowland shall hear of [you]273-prince casamassima , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" [You]273-prince casamassima will hear of [me]2917-i . And whatever [you]273-prince casamassima do hear , remember this : [I]2917-i was sincere ! "[2917-i]

[Prince Casamassima]273-prince casamassima had approached , and [Rowland]281-rowland looked at [him]273-prince casamassima with a good deal of simple compassion as a part of [that " world "[273-prince casamassima] against which [Christina]192-christina had launched [her]192-christina mysterious menace]2921-that " world " against which christina had launched her mysterious menace . It was obvious that [he]273-prince casamassima was [a good fellow]2922-a good fellow , and that [he]273-prince casamassima could not , in the nature of things , be [a positively bad husband]2923-a positively bad husband ; but [his]273-prince casamassima distinguished inoffensiveness only deepened the infelicity of [Christina]192-christina 's situation by depriving [her]192-christina defiant attitude of the sanction of relative justice . So long as [she]192-christina had been free to choose , [she]192-christina had esteemed [him]273-prince casamassima : but from the moment [she]192-christina was forced to marry [him]273-prince casamassima [she]192-christina had detested [him]273-prince casamassima . [Rowland]281-rowland read in [the young man]347-the young man 's elastic Italian mask a profound consciousness of all this ; and as [he]273-prince casamassima found there also a record of other curious things - of pride , of temper , of bigotry , of an immense heritage of more or less aggressive traditions - [he]273-prince casamassima reflected that the matrimonial conjunction of [[his]273-prince casamassima two companions]2925-his two companions might be sufficiently prolific in incident .

" [You]3484-the prince are going to [Naples]52-naples ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland said to [the prince]3484-the prince by way of conversation .

" [We]5319-we are going to [Paris]9-paris , "[192-christina] [Christina]192-christina interposed , slowly and softly . " [We]5319-we are going to [London]162-london . [We]5319-we are going to [Vienna]163-vienna . [We]5319-we are going to [St. Petersburg]164-st. petersburg . "[192-christina]

[Prince Casamassima]273-prince casamassima dropped [his]273-prince casamassima eyes and fretted the earth with the point of [his]273-prince casamassima umbrella . While [he]273-prince casamassima engaged [Rowland]281-rowland 's attention [Christina]192-christina turned away . When [Rowland]281-rowland glanced at [her]192-christina again [he]2927-he saw a change pass over [her]192-christina face ; [she]192-christina was observing something that was concealed from [his]2927-he own eyes by the angle of the church - wall . In a moment [Roderick]325-roderick stepped into sight .

[He]2927-he stopped short , astonished ; [his]2927-he face and figure were jaded , [his]2927-he garments dusty . [He]2927-he looked at [Christina]192-christina from head to foot , and then , slowly , [his]2927-he cheek flushed and [his]2927-he eye expanded . [Christina]192-christina returned [his]2927-he gaze , and for some moments there was a singular silence . " [You]2927-he do n't look well ! "[192-christina] [Christina]192-christina said at last .

[Roderick]325-roderick answered nothing ; [he]2927-he only looked and looked , as if [she]192-christina had been a statue . " [You]192-christina are no less beautiful ! "[2927-he] [he]2927-he presently cried .

[She]192-christina turned away with a smile , and stood a while gazing down [the valley]2844-the valley ; [Roderick]325-roderick stared at [Prince Casamassima]273-prince casamassima . [Christina]192-christina then put out [her]192-christina hand to [Rowland]281-rowland . " Farewell , "[192-christina] [she]192-christina said . " If [you]281-rowland are near [me]192-christina in future , do n't try to see [me]192-christina ! "[192-christina] And then , after a pause , in a lower tone , " [I]192-christina was sincere ! "[192-christina] [She]192-christina addressed [herself]192-christina again to [Roderick]325-roderick and asked [him]2927-he some commonplace about [his]2927-he walk . But [he]2927-he said nothing ; [he]2927-he only looked at [her]192-christina . [Rowland]281-rowland at first had expected an outbreak of reproach , but it was evident that the danger was every moment diminishing . [He]2927-he was forgetting everything but [her]192-christina beauty , and as [she]192-christina stood there and let [him]2927-he feast upon it , [Rowland]281-rowland was sure that [she]192-christina knew it . " [I]192-christina wo n't say farewell to [you]2927-he , "[192-christina] [she]192-christina said ; " [we]5320-we shall meet again ! "[192-christina] And [she]192-christina moved gravely away . [Prince Casamassima]273-prince casamassima took leave courteously of [Rowland]281-rowland ; upon [Roderick]325-roderick [he]273-prince casamassima bestowed a bow of exaggerated civility . [Roderick]325-roderick appeared not to see it ; [he]2927-he was still watching [Christina]192-christina , as [she]192-christina passed over the grass . [His]2927-he eyes followed [her]192-christina until [she]192-christina reached the door of [[her]192-christina inn]2929-her inn . Here [she]192-christina stopped and looked back at [him]2927-he .

CHAPTER XIII . Switzerland

On [the homeward walk]2930-the homeward walk , that evening , [Roderick]325-roderick preserved a silence which [Rowland]281-rowland allowed to make [him]2927-he uneasy . Early on the morrow [Roderick]325-roderick , saying nothing of [his]2927-he intentions , started off on a walk ; [Rowland]281-rowland saw [him]2927-he striding with light steps along [the rugged path to [Engelberg]158-engelberg]2931-the rugged path to engelberg . [He]2927-he was absent all day and [he]2927-he gave no account of [himself]2927-he on [his]2927-he return . [He]2927-he said [he]2927-he was deadly tired , and [he]2927-he went to bed early . When [he]2927-he had left [the room]487-the room [Miss Garland]182-miss garland drew near to [Rowland]281-rowland .

" [I]182-miss garland wish to ask [you]281-rowland a question , "[182-miss garland] [she]182-miss garland said . " What happened to [Roderick]325-roderick yesterday at [Engelberg]158-engelberg ? "[182-miss garland]

" [You]281-rowland have discovered that something happened ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland answered .

" [I]281-rowland am sure of it . Was it something painful ? "[281-rowland]

" [I]182-miss garland do n't know how , at the present moment , [he]2927-he judges it . [He]2927-he met [the Princess Casamassima]281-rowland . "[182-miss garland]

" Thank [you]281-rowland ! "[182-miss garland] said [Miss Garland]182-miss garland , simply , and turned away .

The conversation had been brief , but , like many small things , it furnished [Rowland]281-rowland with food for reflection . When [one]3107-one is looking for [symptoms one]2934-symptoms one easily finds [them]2934-symptoms one . This was the first time [Mary Garland]193-mary garland had asked [Rowland]281-rowland a question which it was in [Roderick]325-roderick 's power to answer , the first time [she]182-miss garland had frankly betrayed [Roderick]325-roderick 's reticence . [Rowland]281-rowland ventured to think it marked an era .

The next morning was sultry , and the air , usually so fresh at those altitudes , was oppressively heavy . [Rowland]281-rowland lounged on the grass a while , near [Singleton]214-singleton , who was at work under [his]214-singleton white umbrella , within view of [the house]3246-the house ; and then in quest of coolness [he]214-singleton wandered away to [the rocky ridge]2936-the rocky ridge whence [you]2937-you looked across at [the Jungfrau]148-the jungfrau . To - day , however , [the white summits]2938-the white summits were invisible ; [their]2938-the white summits heads were muffled in sullen clouds and [the valleys beneath]2939-the valleys beneath [them]2938-the white summits curtained in dun - colored mist . [Rowland]281-rowland had a book in [his]214-singleton pocket , and [he]214-singleton took it out and opened it . But [his]214-singleton page remained unturned ; [his]214-singleton own thoughts were more importunate . [His]214-singleton interview with [Christina Light]192-christina had made a great impression upon [him]214-singleton , and [he]214-singleton was haunted with the memory of [her]192-christina almost blameless bitterness , and of all that was tragic and fatal in [her]192-christina latest transformation . These things were immensely appealing , and [Rowland]281-rowland thought with infinite impatience of [Roderick]325-roderick 's having again encountered [them]2940-them . It required little imagination to apprehend that [the young sculptor]492-the young sculptor 's condition had also appealed to [Christina]192-christina . [His]214-singleton consummate indifference , [his]214-singleton supreme defiance , would make [him]214-singleton [a magnificent trophy]2942-a magnificent trophy , and [Christina]192-christina had announced with sufficient distinctness that [she]192-christina had said good - by to scruples . It was [her]192-christina fancy at present to treat [the world]483-the world as a garden of pleasure , and if , hitherto , [she]192-christina had played with [Roderick]325-roderick 's passion on its stem , there was little doubt that now [she]192-christina would pluck it with an unfaltering hand and drain [it]2944-it of its acrid sweetness . And why [the deuce]3125-the deuce need [Roderick]325-roderick have gone marching back to destruction ? [Rowland]281-rowland 's meditations , even when they began in rancor , often brought [him]214-singleton peace ; but on this occasion they ushered in a quite peculiar quality of unrest . [He]214-singleton felt conscious of a sudden collapse in [his]214-singleton moral energy ; a current that had been flowing for two years with liquid strength seemed at last to pause and evaporate . [Rowland]281-rowland looked away at [the stagnant vapors on [the mountains]1946-the mountains]2946-the stagnant vapors on the mountains ; their dreariness seemed a symbol of the dreariness which [his]214-singleton own generosity had bequeathed [him]214-singleton . At last [he]214-singleton had arrived at the uttermost limit of the deference [a sane man]2948-a sane man might pay to [other people]3286-other people 's folly ; nay , rather , [he]214-singleton had transgressed it ; [he]214-singleton had been befooled on a gigantic scale . [He]214-singleton turned to [his]214-singleton book and tried to woo back patience , but it gave [him]214-singleton cold comfort and [he]214-singleton tossed it angrily away . [He]214-singleton pulled [his]214-singleton hat over [his]214-singleton eyes , and tried to wonder , dispassionately , whether atmospheric conditions had not something to do with [his]214-singleton ill - humor . [He]214-singleton remained for some time in this attitude , but was finally aroused from it by a singular sense that , although [he]214-singleton had heard nothing , [some one]3618-some one had approached [him]214-singleton . [He]214-singleton looked up and saw [Roderick]325-roderick standing before [him]214-singleton on the turf . [His]214-singleton mood made the spectacle unwelcome , and for a moment [he]214-singleton felt like uttering an uncivil speech . [Roderick]325-roderick stood looking at [him]214-singleton with an expression of countenance which had of late become rare . There was an unfamiliar spark in [his]214-singleton eye and a certain imperious alertness in [[his]214-singleton carriage]2951-his carriage . [Confirmed]339-confirmed habit , with [Rowland]281-rowland , came speedily to the front . " What is it now ? "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton asked [himself]214-singleton , and invited [Roderick]325-roderick to sit down . [Roderick]325-roderick had evidently something particular to say , and if [he]214-singleton remained silent for a time it was not because [he]214-singleton was ashamed of it .

" [I]214-singleton would like [you]281-rowland to do [me]214-singleton a favor , "[214-singleton] [he]214-singleton said at last . " Lend [me]214-singleton some money . "[214-singleton]

" How much do [you]281-rowland wish ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland asked .

" Say a thousand francs . "[214-singleton]

[Rowland]281-rowland hesitated a moment . " [I]281-rowland do n't wish to be indiscreet , but may [I]281-rowland ask what [you]281-rowland propose to do with a thousand francs ? "[281-rowland]

" To go to [Interlaken]156-interlaken . "[214-singleton]

" And why are [you]281-rowland going to [Interlaken]156-interlaken ? "[281-rowland]

[Roderick]325-roderick replied without a shadow of wavering , " Because [that woman]4982-that woman is to be there . "[325-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland burst out laughing , but [Roderick]325-roderick remained serenely grave . " [You]281-rowland have forgiven [her]4982-that woman , then ? "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" Not a bit of it ! "[214-singleton]

" [I]214-singleton do n't understand . "[214-singleton]

" Neither do [I.]214-singleton [I]214-singleton only know that [she]4982-that woman is incomparably beautiful , and that [she]4982-that woman has waked [me]214-singleton up amazingly . Besides , [she]4982-that woman asked [me]214-singleton to come . "[214-singleton]

" [She]4982-that woman asked [you]281-rowland ? "[214-singleton]

" Yesterday , in so many words . "[214-singleton]

" Ah , the jade ! "[214-singleton]

" Exactly . [I]214-singleton am willing to take [her]4982-that woman for that . "[214-singleton]

" Why in the name of common sense did [you]281-rowland go back to [her]4982-that woman ? "[214-singleton]

" Why did [I]214-singleton find [her]4982-that woman standing there like [a goddess who had just stepped out of [her]4982-that woman cloud]5322-a goddess who had just stepped out of her cloud ? Why did [I]214-singleton look at [her]4982-that woman ? Before [I]214-singleton knew where [I]214-singleton was , the harm was done . "[214-singleton]

[Rowland]281-rowland , who had been sitting erect , threw [himself]281-rowland back on the grass and lay for some time staring up at the sky . At last , raising [himself]281-rowland , " Are [you]281-rowland perfectly serious ? "[2952-i] [he]2952-i asked .

" Deadly serious . "[214-singleton]

" [Your]281-rowland idea is to remain at [Interlaken]156-interlaken some time ? "[281-rowland]

" Indefinitely ! "[325-roderick] said [Roderick]325-roderick ; and it seemed to [[his]2952-i companion]555-his companion that the tone in which [he]2952-i said this made it immensely well worth hearing .

" And [[your]281-rowland mother]3145-your mother and [cousin]5324-cousin , meanwhile , are to remain [here]3130-here ? It will soon be getting very cold , [you]281-rowland know . "[2952-i]

" It does n't seem much like it to - day . "[281-rowland]

" Very true ; but to - day is a day by itself . "[2952-i]

" There is nothing to prevent [their]5326-their going back to [Lucerne]147-lucerne . [I]281-rowland depend upon [your]281-rowland taking charge of [them]5326-their . "[281-rowland]

At this [Rowland]281-rowland reclined upon the grass again ; and again , after reflection , [he]2952-i faced [[his]2952-i friend]606-his friend . " How would [you]606-his friend express , "[2952-i] [he]2952-i asked , " the character of the profit that [you]606-his friend expect to derive from [your]606-his friend excursion ? "[2952-i]

" [I]2952-i see no need of expressing it . The proof of the pudding is in the eating ! The case is simply this . [I]2952-i desire immensely to be near [Christina Light]192-christina , and it is such a huge refreshment to find [myself]2952-i again desiring something , that [I]2952-i propose to drift with the current . As [I]2952-i say , [she]192-christina has waked [me]2952-i up , and it is possible something may come of it . [She]192-christina makes [me]2952-i feel as if [I]2952-i were alive again . This , "[2952-i] and [he]2952-i glanced down at [the inn]956-the inn , " [I]2952-i call death ! "[2952-i]

" That [I]325-roderick am very grateful to hear . [You]606-his friend really feel as if [you]606-his friend might do something ? "[325-roderick]

" Do n't ask too much . [I]2952-i only know that [she]192-christina makes [my]2952-i heart beat , makes [me]2952-i see visions . "[2952-i]

" [You]606-his friend feel encouraged ? "[325-roderick]

" [I]2952-i feel excited . "[2952-i]

" [You]606-his friend are really looking better . "[325-roderick]

" [I]2952-i am glad to hear it . Now that [I]2952-i have answered [your]281-rowland questions , please to give [me]2952-i the money . "[2952-i]

[Rowland]281-rowland shook [his]2952-i head . " For that purpose , [I]281-rowland ca n't ! "[281-rowland]

" [You]606-his friend ca n't ? "[325-roderick]

" It 's impossible . [Your]281-rowland plan is rank folly . [I]281-rowland ca n't help [you]281-rowland in it . "[281-rowland]

[Roderick]325-roderick flushed a little , and [his]2952-i eye expanded . " [I]2952-i will borrow what money [I]2952-i can , then , from [Mary]193-mary garland ! "[2952-i] This was not viciously said ; it had simply the ring of passionate resolution .

Instantly it brought [Rowland]281-rowland to terms . [He]2952-i took a bunch of keys from [his]2952-i pocket and tossed it upon the grass . " The little brass one opens [my]2952-i dressing - case , "[2952-i] [he]2952-i said . " [You]281-rowland will find money in it . "[2952-i]

[Roderick]325-roderick let the keys lie ; something seemed to have struck [him]2952-i ; [he]2952-i looked askance at [[his]2952-i friend]606-his friend . " [You]325-roderick are awfully gallant ! "[2952-i]

" [You]325-roderick certainly are not . [Your]325-roderick proposal is an outrage . "[2952-i]

" Very likely . It 's a proof the more of [my]2952-i desire . "[2952-i]

" If [you]325-roderick have so much steam on , then , use it for something else . [You]325-roderick say [you]325-roderick are awake again . [I]2952-i am delighted ; only be so in the best sense . Is n't it very plain ? If [you]325-roderick have the energy to desire , [you]325-roderick have also the energy to reason and to judge . If [you]325-roderick can care to go , [you]325-roderick can also care to stay , and staying being the more profitable course , the inspiration , on that side , for [a man who has [his]5327-a man who has his self - confidence to win back again self - confidence to win back again]5327-a man who has his self - confidence to win back again , should be greater . "[2952-i]

[Roderick]325-roderick , plainly , did not relish this simple logic , and [his]2952-i eye grew angry as [he]2952-i listened to its echo . " Oh , [the devil]3660-the devil ! "[2952-i] [he]2952-i cried .

[Rowland]281-rowland went on . " Do [you]325-roderick believe that hanging about [Christina Light]192-christina will do [you]325-roderick any good ? Do [you]325-roderick believe it wo n't ? In either case [you]325-roderick should keep away from [her]192-christina . If it wo n't , it 's [your]325-roderick duty ; and if it will , [you]325-roderick can get on without it . "[281-rowland]

" Do [me]325-roderick good ? "[325-roderick] cried [Roderick]325-roderick . " What do [I]325-roderick want of ' good ' - what should [I]325-roderick do with ' good ' ? [I]325-roderick want what [she]192-christina gives [me]325-roderick , call it by what name [you]325-roderick will . [I]325-roderick want to ask no questions , but to take what comes and let it fill the impossible hours ! But [I]325-roderick did n't come to discuss the matter . "[325-roderick]

" [I]281-rowland have not the least desire to discuss it , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland . " [I]281-rowland simply protest . "[281-rowland]

[Roderick]325-roderick meditated a moment . " [I]2957-i have never yet thought twice of accepting a favor of [you]281-rowland , "[2957-i] [he]2957-i said at last ; " but this one sticks in [my]2957-i throat . "[2957-i]

" It is not a favor ; [I]2957-i lend [you]281-rowland the money only under compulsion . "[2957-i]

" Well , then , [I]325-roderick will take it only under compulsion ! "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick exclaimed . And [he]2957-i sprang up abruptly and marched away .

[His]2957-i words were ambiguous ; [Rowland]281-rowland lay on the grass , wondering what they meant . Half an hour had not elapsed before [Roderick]325-roderick reappeared , heated with rapid walking , and wiping [his]2957-i forehead . [He]2957-i flung [himself]2957-i down and looked at [[his]2957-i friend]606-his friend with an eye which expressed something purer than bravado and yet baser than conviction .

" [I]2957-i have done [my]2957-i best ! "[2957-i] [he]2957-i said . " [[My]2957-i mother]3224-my mother is out of money ; [she]3224-my mother is expecting next week some circular notes from [London]162-london . [She]3224-my mother had only ten francs in [her]3224-my mother pocket . [Mary Garland]193-mary garland gave [me]2957-i every sou [she]193-mary garland possessed in [the world]483-the world . It makes exactly thirty - four francs . That 's not enough . "[2957-i]

" [You]281-rowland asked [Miss Garland]182-miss garland ? "[281-rowland] cried [Rowland]281-rowland .

" [I]2957-i asked [her]182-miss garland . "[2957-i]

" And told [her]182-miss garland [your]281-rowland purpose ? "[2957-i]

" [I]2957-i named no names . But [she]182-miss garland knew ! "[2957-i]

" What did [she]182-miss garland say ? "[2957-i]

" Not a syllable . [She]182-miss garland simply emptied [her]182-miss garland purse . "[2957-i]

[Rowland]281-rowland turned over and buried [his]2959-he face in [his]2959-he arms . [He]2959-he felt a movement of irrepressible elation , and [he]2959-he barely stifled a cry of joy . Now , surely , [Roderick]325-roderick had shattered the last link in the chain that bound [Mary]193-mary garland to [him]2959-he , and after this [she]193-mary garland would be free ! ... When [he]2959-he turned about again , [Roderick]325-roderick was still sitting there , and [he]2959-he had not touched the keys which lay on the grass .

" [I]325-roderick do n't know what is the matter with [me]325-roderick , "[325-roderick] said [Roderick]325-roderick , " but [I]325-roderick have an insurmountable aversion to taking [your]193-mary garland money . "[325-roderick]

" The matter , [I]2959-he suppose , is that [you]325-roderick have a grain of wisdom left . "[2959-he]

" No , it 's not that . It 's a kind of brute instinct . [I]2959-he find it extremely provoking ! "[2959-he] [He]2959-he sat there for some time with [his]2959-he head in [his]2959-he hands and [his]2959-he eyes on the ground . [His]2959-he lips were compressed , and [he]2959-he was evidently , in fact , in a state of profound irritation . " [You]281-rowland have succeeded in making this thing excessively unpleasant ! "[2959-he] [he]2959-he exclaimed .

" [I]281-rowland am sorry , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , " but [I]281-rowland ca n't see it in any other way . "[281-rowland]

" That [I]325-roderick believe , and [I]325-roderick resent the range of [your]193-mary garland vision pretending to be the limit of [my]325-roderick action . [You]193-mary garland ca n't feel for [me]325-roderick nor judge for [me]325-roderick , and there are certain things [you]193-mary garland know nothing about . [I]325-roderick have suffered , [sir]3318-sir ! "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick went on with increasing emphasis . " [I]325-roderick have suffered damnable torments . Have [I]325-roderick been such [a placid , contented , comfortable man]5332-a placid , contented , comfortable man this last six months , that when [I]325-roderick find a chance to forget [my]325-roderick misery , [I]325-roderick should take such pains not to profit by it ? [You]193-mary garland ask too much , for [a man who [himself]5333-a man who himself has no occasion to play the hero has no occasion to play [the hero]5334-the hero]5333-a man who himself has no occasion to play the hero . [I]325-roderick do n't say that invidiously ; it 's [your]193-mary garland disposition , and [you]193-mary garland ca n't help it . But decidedly , there are certain things [you]193-mary garland know nothing about . "[325-roderick]

[Rowland]281-rowland listened to this outbreak with open eyes , and [Roderick]325-roderick , if [he]2960-he had been less intent upon [his]2960-he own eloquence , would probably have perceived that [he]2960-he turned pale . " These things - what are they ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland asked .

" [They]5335-they are [women]3288-women , principally , and what relates to [women]3288-women . Women for [you]193-mary garland , by what [I]325-roderick can make out , mean nothing . [You]193-mary garland have no imagination - no sensibility ! "[325-roderick]

" That 's a serious charge , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , gravely .

" [I]325-roderick do n't make it without proof ! "[325-roderick]

" And what is [your]325-roderick proof ? "[325-roderick]

[Roderick]325-roderick hesitated a moment . " The way [you]325-roderick treated [Christina Light]192-christina . [I]325-roderick call that grossly obtuse . "[325-roderick]

" Obtuse ? "[281-rowland] [Rowland]281-rowland repeated , frowning .

" Thick - skinned , beneath [your]325-roderick good fortune . "[325-roderick]

" [My]325-roderick good fortune ? "[325-roderick]

" There it is - it 's all news to [you]193-mary garland ! [You]193-mary garland had pleased [her]192-christina . [I]325-roderick do n't say [she]192-christina was dying of love for [you]193-mary garland , but [she]192-christina took a fancy to [you]193-mary garland . "[325-roderick]

" [We]5338-we will let this pass ! "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland , after a silence .

" Oh , [I]325-roderick do n't insist . [I]325-roderick have only [her]192-christina own word for it . "[325-roderick]

" [She]192-christina told [you]325-roderick this ? "[325-roderick]

" [You]325-roderick noticed , at least , [I]325-roderick suppose , that [she]192-christina was not afraid to speak . [I]325-roderick never repeated it , not because [I]325-roderick was jealous , but because [I]325-roderick was curious to see how long [your]325-roderick ignorance would last if left to itself . "[325-roderick]

" [I]325-roderick frankly confess it would have lasted forever . And yet [I]325-roderick do n't consider that [my]325-roderick insensibility is proved . "[325-roderick]

" Oh , do n't say that , "[325-roderick] cried [Roderick]325-roderick , " or [I]325-roderick shall begin to suspect - what [I]325-roderick must do [you]325-roderick the justice to say that [I]325-roderick never have suspected - that [you]325-roderick are a trifle conceited . Upon [my]325-roderick word , when [I]325-roderick think of all this , [your]325-roderick protest , as [you]325-roderick call it , against [my]325-roderick following Christina Light seems to [me]325-roderick thoroughly offensive . There is something monstrous in [a man]3214-a man 's pretending to lay down the law to a sort of emotion with which [he]3214-a man is quite unacquainted - in [his]3214-a man asking [a fellow]3651-a fellow to give up [a lovely woman]5341-a lovely woman for conscience ' sake , when [he]3214-a man has never had the impulse to strike a blow for one for passion 's ! "[325-roderick]

" Oh , oh ! "[281-rowland] cried [Rowland]281-rowland .

" All that 's very easy to say , "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick went on ; " but [you]325-roderick must remember that there are such things as nerves , and senses , and imagination , and [a restless demon within that may sleep sometimes for a day]5342-a restless demon within that may sleep sometimes for a day , or for six months , but that sooner or later wakes up and thumps at [your]325-roderick ribs till [you]325-roderick listen to [him]5342-a restless demon within that may sleep sometimes for a day ! If [you]325-roderick ca n't understand it , take it on trust , and let [a poor imaginative devil]5343-a poor imaginative devil live [his]5343-a poor imaginative devil life as [he]5343-a poor imaginative devil can ! "[325-roderick]

[Roderick]325-roderick 's words seemed at first to [Rowland]281-rowland like something heard in a dream ; it was impossible they had been actually spoken - so supreme an expression were they of the insolence of egotism . Reality was never so consistent as that ! But [Roderick]325-roderick sat there balancing [his]2961-i beautiful head , and the echoes of [his]2961-i strident accent still lingered along the half - muffled mountain - side . [Rowland]281-rowland suddenly felt that the cup of [his]2961-i chagrin was full to overflowing , and [his]2961-i long - gathered bitterness surged into the simple , wholesome passion of anger for wasted kindness . But [he]2961-i spoke without violence , and [Roderick]325-roderick was probably at first far from measuring the force that lay beneath [his]2961-i words .

" [You]325-roderick are incredibly ungrateful , "[2961-i] [he]2961-i said . " [You]325-roderick are talking arrogant nonsense . What do [you]325-roderick know about [my]2961-i sensibilities and [my]2961-i imagination ? How do [you]325-roderick know whether [I]2961-i have loved or suffered ? If [I]2961-i have held [my]2961-i tongue and not troubled [you]325-roderick with [my]2961-i complaints , [you]325-roderick find it the most natural thing in [the world]483-the world to put an ignoble construction on [my]2961-i silence . [I]2961-i loved quite as well as [you]325-roderick ; indeed , [I]2961-i think [I]2961-i may say rather better . [I]2961-i have been constant . [I]2961-i have been willing to give more than [I]2961-i received . [I]2961-i have not forsaken [one mistress]5345-one mistress because [I]2961-i thought [another more beautiful]5346-another more beautiful , nor given up the other and believed all manner of evil about [her]5345-one mistress because [I]2961-i had not [my]2961-i way with [her]5345-one mistress . [I]2961-i have been [a good friend to [Christina Light]192-christina]5347-a good friend to christina light , and it seems to [me]2961-i [my]2961-i friendship does [her]192-christina quite as much honor as [your]192-christina love ! "[2961-i]

" [Your]192-christina love - [your]192-christina suffering - [your]192-christina silence - [your]192-christina friendship ! "[325-roderick] cried [Roderick]325-roderick . " [I]325-roderick declare [I]325-roderick do n't understand ! "[325-roderick]

" [I]2961-i dare say not . [You]192-christina are not used to understanding such things - [you]192-christina are not used to hearing [me]2961-i talk of [my]2961-i feelings . [You]192-christina are altogether too much taken up with [your]192-christina own . Be as much so as [you]192-christina please ; [I]2961-i have always respected [your]192-christina right . Only when [I]2961-i have kept [myself]2961-i in [durance]166-durance on purpose to leave [you]192-christina an open field , do n't , by way of thanking [me]2961-i , come and call [me]2961-i [an idiot]5348-an idiot . "[2961-i]

" Oh , [you]2961-i claim then that [you]2961-i have made sacrifices ? "[325-roderick]

" Several ! [You]2961-i have never suspected it ? "[2961-i]

" If [I]325-roderick had , do [you]281-rowland suppose [I]325-roderick would have allowed it ? "[325-roderick] cried [Roderick]325-roderick .

" [They]5349-they were the sacrifices of friendship and they were easily made ; only [I]2961-i do n't enjoy having them thrown back in [my]2961-i teeth . "[2961-i]

This was , under the circumstances , a sufficiently generous speech ; but [Roderick]325-roderick was not in the humor to take it generously . " Come , be more definite , "[2962-he] [he]2962-he said . " Let [me]2962-he know where it is the shoe has pinched . "[2962-he]

[Rowland]281-rowland frowned ; if [Roderick]325-roderick would not take generosity , [he]2962-he should have full justice . " It 's a perpetual sacrifice , "[2962-he] [he]2962-he said , " to live with [a perfect egotist]5350-a perfect egotist . "[2962-he]

" [I]325-roderick am [an egotist]5351-an egotist ? "[325-roderick] cried [Roderick]325-roderick .

" Did it never occur to [you]281-rowland ? "[2962-he]

" [An egotist to whom [you]281-rowland have made perpetual sacrifices]5352-an egotist to whom you have made perpetual sacrifices ? "[2962-he] [He]2962-he repeated the words in a singular tone ; a tone that denoted neither exactly indignation nor incredulity , but strange as it may seem a sudden violent curiosity for news about [himself]2962-he .

" [You]281-rowland are selfish , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland ; " [you]281-rowland think only of [yourself]281-rowland and believe only in [yourself]281-rowland . [You]281-rowland regard [other people]3286-other people only as [they]3286-other people play into [your]281-rowland own hands . [You]281-rowland have always been very frank about it , and the thing seemed so mixed up with the temper of [your]281-rowland genius and the very structure of [your]281-rowland mind , that often [one]3107-one was willing to take the evil with the good and to be thankful that , considering [your]281-rowland great talent , [you]281-rowland were no worse . But if [one]3107-one believed in [you]281-rowland , as [I]281-rowland have done , [one]3107-one paid a tax upon it . "[281-rowland]

[Roderick]325-roderick leaned [his]2963-i elbows on [his]2963-i knees , clasped [his]2963-i hands together , and crossed them , shadewise , over [his]2963-i eyes . In this attitude , for a moment , [he]2963-i sat looking coldly at [[his]2963-i friend]606-his friend . " So [I]2963-i have made [you]606-his friend very uncomfortable ? "[2963-i] [he]2963-i went on .

" Extremely so . "[2963-i]

" [I]2963-i have been eager , grasping , obstinate , vain , ungrateful , indifferent , cruel ? "[2963-i]

" [I]2963-i have accused [you]606-his friend , mentally , of all these things , with the exception of vanity . "[2963-i]

" [You]2963-i have often hated [me]2963-i ? "[2963-i]

" Never . [I]2963-i should have parted company with [you]606-his friend before coming to that . "[2963-i]

" But [you]2963-i have wanted to part company , to bid [me]2963-i go [my]2963-i way and be hanged ! "[2963-i]

" Repeatedly . Then [I]2963-i have had patience and forgiven [you]606-his friend . "[2963-i]

" Forgiven [me]2963-i , eh ? Suffering all the while ? "[2963-i]

" Yes , [you]606-his friend may call it suffering . "[2963-i]

" Why did [you]2963-i never tell [me]2963-i all this before ? "[2963-i]

"[2963-i]

[Roderick]325-roderick picked up a blade of long grass and began to bite it ; [Rowland]281-rowland was puzzled by [his]2965-his expression and manner . " [I]325-roderick must have been hideous , "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick presently resumed .

" [I]281-rowland am not talking for [your]325-roderick entertainment , "[281-rowland] said [Rowland]281-rowland .

" It has been a terrible mistake , then ? "[2965-his] What [his]2965-his tone expressed was not willful mockery , but a kind of persistent irresponsibility which [Rowland]281-rowland found equally exasperating . [He]2965-his answered nothing .

" And all this time , "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick continued , " [you]281-rowland have been in love ? Tell [me]325-roderick [the woman]5358-the woman . "[325-roderick]

Apparently [he]2965-his succeeded . The surprise was great ; [Roderick]325-roderick colored as [he]2965-his had never done . " [Mary Garland]193-mary garland ? Heaven forgive [us]5359-us ! "[2965-his]

[Rowland]281-rowland observed the " [us]5359-us ; "[281-rowland] [Roderick]325-roderick threw [himself]325-roderick back on the turf . [The latter]652-the latter lay for some time staring at the sky . At last [he]2965-his sprang to [his]2965-his feet , and [Rowland]281-rowland rose also , rejoicing keenly , it must be confessed , in [[his]2965-his companion]555-his companion 's confusion .

" For how long has this been ? "[325-roderick] [Roderick]325-roderick demanded .

" Since [I]281-rowland first knew [her]5358-the woman . "[281-rowland]

" Two years ! And [you]281-rowland have never told [her]5358-the woman ? "[281-rowland]

" Never . "[281-rowland]

" [You]281-rowland have told [no one]629-no one ? "[281-rowland]

" [You]281-rowland are [the first person]5361-the first person . "[281-rowland]

" Why have [you]281-rowland been silent ? "[281-rowland]
